trans-unit.source: As with normal exceptions, these Error exceptions will bubble up until they reach the first matching catch block. If there are no matching blocks, then any default exception handler installed with set_exception_handler() will be called, and if there is no default exception handler, then the exception will be converted to a fatal error and will be handled like a traditional error.
trans-unit.target: 与普通异常一样，这些Error异常会冒泡直到到达第一个匹配的catch块。如果没有匹配的块，则将调用安装有set_exception_handler（）的任何默认异常处理程序，如果没有默认的异常处理程序，则该异常将转换为致命错误，并将像传统错误一样进行处理。

trans-unit.source: As with timers, the callback is guaranteed to be invoked only when the point in time where it is supposed to trigger has passed. If multiple timers become ready during the same loop iteration then the ones with earlier time-out values are invoked before ones with later time-out values (but this is no longer true when a callback calls EvLoop::run() recursively).
trans-unit.target: 与计时器一样，保证仅在应该触发回调的时间点过去时才调用该回调。如果在同一循环迭代中准备好多个计时器，则将在具有较高超时值的计时器之前调用具有较高超时值的计时器（但是，当回调递归调用EvLoop :: run（）时，将不再是正确的）。

trans-unit.source: Assertion subpatterns are not capturing subpatterns, and may not be repeated, because it makes no sense to assert the same thing several times. If any kind of assertion contains capturing subpatterns within it, these are counted for the purposes of numbering the capturing subpatterns in the whole pattern. However, substring capturing is carried out only for positive assertions, because it does not make sense for negative assertions.
trans-unit.target: 断言子模式不是捕获子模式,也不能重复,因为多次断言同一件事是没有意义的。如果任何一种断言中包含了捕获子模式,这些子模式会被计算在内,以便对整个模式中的捕获子模式进行编号。然而,子串捕获只对正断言进行,因为它对负断言没有意义。

trans-unit.source: Assertions can be nested in any combination. For example, (?<=(?<!foo)bar)baz matches an occurrence of "baz" that is preceded by "bar" which in turn is not preceded by "foo", while (?<=\d{3}...(?<!999))foo is another pattern which matches "foo" preceded by three digits and any three characters that are not "999".
trans-unit.target: 断言可以嵌套为任何组合。例如，（？<=（？<！foo）bar）baz匹配出现在“ baz”前面的“ bar”，而“ bar”前面没有“ foo”，而（？<= \ d {3 } ...（？<！999））foo是另一个与“ foo”相匹配的模式，该前缀以三位数字和任意三个非“ 999”字符组成。

trans-unit.source: Assertions count towards the maximum of 200 parenthesized subpatterns.
trans-unit.target: 断言计入最多200个小括号子模式。

trans-unit.source: Assertions should be used as a debugging feature only. You may use them for sanity-checks that test for conditions that should always be TRUE and that indicate some programming errors if not or to check for the presence of certain features like extension functions or certain system limits and features.
trans-unit.target: 断言应仅用作调试功能。您可以将它们用于完整性检查，以测试应该始终为 TRUE 的条件，如果条件不正确则指示某些编程错误，或者检查是否存在某些功能，例如扩展功能或某些系统限制和功能。

trans-unit.source: Assertions should not be used for normal runtime operations like input parameter checks. As a rule of thumb your code should always be able to work correctly if assertion checking is not activated.
trans-unit.target: 断言不应该被用于正常的运行时操作,比如输入参数检查。作为一个经验法则,如果没有激活断言检查,你的代码应该总是能够正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Assuming you're familiar with the concept of functions (if you're not, take a look at the chapter about functions), you'd assume that typing $c = foo() is essentially just like writing $c = 5, and you're right. Usually functions don't just return a static value but compute something.

trans-unit.source: Basics
trans-unit.target: Basics

trans-unit.source: Basics →
trans-unit.target: 基础→

trans-unit.source: Be aware that some socket implementations need to be handled very carefully. A few basic rules:
trans-unit.target: 要知道,有些套接字的实现需要非常小心地处理。几个基本规则。

trans-unit.source: Be careful about variables that may match HTML entities. Things like &amp, &copy and &pound are parsed by the browser and the actual entity is used instead of the desired variable name. This is an obvious hassle that the W3C has been telling people about for years. The reference is here: » http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/appendix/notes.html#h-B.2.2.
trans-unit.target: 请注意可能与HTML实体匹配的变量。浏览器会解析＆amp，＆copy和＆pound之类的内容，并使用实际实体代替所需的变量名。W3C多年来一直在告诉人们这是一个明显的麻烦。参考在这里：»http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/appendix/notes.html#hB.2.2。

trans-unit.source: Be careful if you choose to escape characters 0, a, b, f, n, r, t and v. They will be converted to \0, \a, \b, \f, \n, \r, \t and \v, all of which are predefined escape sequences in C. Many of these sequences are also defined in other C-derived languages, including PHP, meaning that you may not get the desired result if you use the output of addcslashes() to generate code in those languages with these characters defined in charlist.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择转义字符0，a，b，f，n，r，t和v，请小心。它们将被转换为\ 0，\ a，\ b，\ f，\ n，\ r，\ t和\ v，所有这些都是C中预定义的转义序列。许多这些序列也用其他C派生的语言（包括PHP）定义，这意味着如果您使用addcslashes（）的输出来生成，可能无法获得预期的结果用 charlist 中定义的这些字符用这些语言编写代码。

trans-unit.source: Be careful when passing arguments with mixed types values because max() can produce unpredictable results.
trans-unit.target: 传递带有混合类型值的参数时要小心，因为max（）会产生不可预测的结果。

trans-unit.source: Be careful when passing arguments with mixed types values because min() can produce unpredictable results.
trans-unit.target: 传递带有混合类型值的参数时要小心，因为min（）可能会产生不可预测的结果。

trans-unit.source: Be careful when sorting arrays with mixed types values because sort() can produce unpredictable results.
trans-unit.target: 使用混合类型值对数组进行排序时要小心，因为sort（）可能会产生不可预测的结果。

trans-unit.source: Be careful when using array syntax. Scalar keys will be coerced to integers by the engine. For example, $map["1"] will attempt to access int(1), while $map->get("1") will correctly look up the string key.
trans-unit.target: 使用数组语法时要小心。标量键将被引擎强制为整数。例如， $map["1"] 将尝试访问 int(1) ，而 $map->get("1") 将正确查找字符串键。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to read the note about escaping namespace names in strings.
trans-unit.target: 确保阅读有关在字符串中转义名称空间名称的注释。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to use the === operator when checking for an error. Since the socket_select() may return 0 the comparison with == would evaluate to TRUE:
trans-unit.target: 检查错误时，请务必使用===运算符。由于socket_select（）可能返回0，因此与==的比较将得出 TRUE ：

trans-unit.source: Be sure to use the === operator when checking for an error. Since the stream_select() may return 0 the comparison with == would evaluate to TRUE:
trans-unit.target: 检查错误时，请务必使用===运算符。由于stream_select（）可能返回0，因此与==的比较将得出 TRUE ：

trans-unit.source: Became available when using Apache 1, or the PHP Apache 2 filter API. Before this time, it was only available when using the Apache 2 handler API.
trans-unit.target: 在使用Apache 1或PHP Apache 2 过滤器 API 时可用。在此之前，它仅在使用Apache 2 处理程序 API 时可用。

trans-unit.source: Because pg_query() and pg_query_params() return FALSE if the query fails, you must use pg_send_query() and pg_get_result() to get the result handle.
trans-unit.target: 因为如果查询失败，pg_query（）和pg_query_params（）返回 FALSE ，所以必须使用pg_send_query（）和pg_get_result（）来获取结果句柄。

trans-unit.source: Because pg_query() returns FALSE if the query fails, you must use pg_send_query() and pg_get_result() to get the result handle.
trans-unit.target: 因为如果查询失败，pg_query（）返回 FALSE ，所以必须使用pg_send_query（）和pg_get_result（）来获取结果句柄。

trans-unit.source: Because variable variables may not be used with PHP's Superglobal arrays within functions, the Superglobal arrays may not be passed into compact().
trans-unit.target: 因为可变变量可能无法与PHP的函数内的Superglobal数组一起使用，所以Superglobal数组可能不会传递给compact（）。

trans-unit.source: Because include is a special language construct, parentheses are not needed around its argument. Take care when comparing return value.
trans-unit.target: 因为include是一种特殊的语言构造，所以在其参数周围不需要括号。比较返回值时要小心。

trans-unit.source: Because NAN represents any number of different values, NAN should not be compared to other values, including itself, and instead should be checked for using is_nan().
trans-unit.target: 由于 NAN 代表任意数量的不同值，因此不应将 NAN 与其他值（包括其自身）进行比较，而应使用is_nan（）进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Because flock() requires a file pointer, you may have to use a special lock file to protect access to a file that you intend to truncate by opening it in write mode (with a "w" or "w+" argument to fopen()).
trans-unit.target: 因为flock（）需要文件指针，所以您可能必须使用特殊的锁定文件来保护要截断的文件的访问，方法是在写模式下打开文件（对fopen（）使用“ w”或“ w +”参数））。

trans-unit.source: Because str_ireplace() replaces left to right, it might replace a previously inserted value when doing multiple replacements. Example #2 in the str_replace() documentation demonstrates how this may affect you in practice.
trans-unit.target: 由于str_ireplace（）从左到右替换，因此在进行多次替换时它可能替换以前插入的值。str_replace（）文档中的示例＃2 演示了如何在实践中影响您。

trans-unit.source: Because str_replace() replaces left to right, it might replace a previously inserted value when doing multiple replacements. See also the examples in this document.
trans-unit.target: 由于str_replace（）从左到右替换，因此在进行多次替换时可能会替换以前插入的值。另请参阅本文档中的示例。

trans-unit.source: Because strip_tags() does not actually validate the HTML, partial or broken tags can result in the removal of more text/data than expected.
trans-unit.target: 由于strip_tags（）实际上并未验证HTML，因此部分或损坏的标签可能导致删除的文本/数据超出预期。

trans-unit.source: Because trim() trims characters from the beginning and end of a string, it may be confusing when characters are (or are not) removed from the middle. trim('abc', 'bad') removes both 'a' and 'b' because it trims 'a' thus moving 'b' to the beginning to also be trimmed. So, this is why it "works" whereas trim('abc', 'b') seemingly does not.
trans-unit.target: 因为trim（）从字符串的开头和结尾修剪字符，所以从中间去除（或不去除）字符时可能会造成混淆。trim（'abc'，'bad'）会同时删除'a'和'b'，因为它会修剪'a'，因此也会将'b'移到开始处。因此，这就是为什么它“起作用”而trim（'abc'，'b'）似乎不起作用的原因。

trans-unit.source: Because PHP determines the types of variables and converts them (generally) as needed, it is not always obvious what type a given variable is at any one time. PHP includes several functions which find out what type a variable is, such as: gettype(), is_array(), is_float(), is_int(), is_object(), and is_string(). See also the chapter on Types.
trans-unit.target: 由于PHP确定变量的类型并根据需要（通常）进行转换，因此在任何时候，给定变量的类型并不总是很明显。PHP包含几个函数，这些函数找出变量的类型，例如：gettype（），is_array（），is_float（），is_int（），is_object（）和is_string（）。另请参阅“ 类型 ”一章。

trans-unit.source: Because PHP's integer type is signed, and many IP addresses will result in negative integers on 32-bit architectures, you need to use the "%u" formatter of sprintf() or printf() to get the string representation of the unsigned IP address.
trans-unit.target: 因为PHP的整数类型是带符号的，并且许多IP地址在32位体系结构上都将导致负整数，所以您需要使用sprintf（）或printf（）的“％u”格式化程序来获取无符号IP地址的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Because PHP's integer type is signed many crc32 checksums will result in negative integers on 32bit platforms. On 64bit installations all crc32() results will be positive integers though.
trans-unit.target: 由于PHP的整数类型是带符号的，因此许多crc32校验和将在32位平台上导致负整数。在64位安装上，所有crc32（）结果均为正整数。

trans-unit.source: Because assigning an array to another variable resets the original array's pointer, our example above would cause an endless loop had we assigned <var><var>$fruit</var></var> to another variable inside the loop.
trans-unit.target: 因为将数组分配给另一个变量会重置原始数组的指针，所以如果我们在循环内将 <var><var>$fruit</var></var> 分配给另一个变量，则上面的示例将导致无限循环。

trans-unit.source: Because every system is setup differently, phpinfo() is commonly used to check configuration settings and for available predefined variables on a given system.
trans-unit.target: 因为每个系统的设置都不同，所以phpinfo（）通常用于检查配置设置和给定系统上可用的预定义变量。

trans-unit.source: Because of eccentricities in the performance of libresolv between platforms, DNS_ANY will not always return every record, the slower DNS_ALL will collect all records more reliably.
trans-unit.target: 由于平台之间 DNS_ANY 性能的怪异性，DNS_ANY不会总是返回每个记录，较慢的 DNS_ALL 将更可靠地收集所有记录。

trans-unit.source: Because of the way floats are represented internally, you should not test two floats for equality.
trans-unit.target: 由于float的内部表示方式，您不应测试两个float的相等性。

trans-unit.source: Because setting a cookie with a value of FALSE will try to delete the cookie, you should not use boolean values. Instead, use 0 for FALSE and 1 for TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 因为将cookie设置为 FALSE 值将尝试删除该cookie，所以不应使用布尔值。相反，使用0为 FALSE 和1为 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Because static methods are callable without an instance of the object created, the pseudo-variable <var><var>$this</var></var> is not available inside the method declared as static.
trans-unit.target: 由于无需创建对象实例即可调用静态方法，因此伪变量 <var><var>$this</var></var> 在声明为static的方法内部不可用。

trans-unit.source: Because the SessionHandler wraps the current internal save handler methods, the above example of encryption can be applied to any internal save handler without having to know the internals of the handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由于SessionHandler包装了当前的内部保存处理程序方法，因此上述加密示例可以应用于任何内部保存处理程序，而无需了解处理程序的内部。

trans-unit.source: Because the effects may vary depending on the ODBC driver, use of this function in scripts to be made publicly available is strongly discouraged. Also, some ODBC options are not available to this function because they must be set before the connection is established or the query is prepared. However, if on a particular job it can make PHP work so your boss doesn't tell you to use a commercial product, that's all that really matters.
trans-unit.target: 由于效果可能因ODBC驱动程序的不同而不同,所以强烈不建议在要公开的脚本中使用这个函数。另外,有些ODBC选项不能用于这个函数,因为它们必须在建立连接或准备查询之前设置。然而,如果在某项工作中,它可以使PHP工作,所以你的老板不会叫你使用商业产品,这才是真正重要的。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of an array can be anything, it can also be another array. This enables the creation of recursive and multi-dimensional arrays.
trans-unit.target: 因为一个数组的值可以是任何值，所以它也可以是另一个array。这使得能够创建递归和多维数组。

trans-unit.source: Because there are so many methods, here is a handy list of methods, somewhat reduced to their general purpose:
trans-unit.target: 由于方法太多,这里列出了一个方便的方法清单,有点缩减到它们的一般用途。

trans-unit.source: Because this function depends on the current scope to determine parameter details, it cannot be used as a function parameter in versions prior to 5.3.0. If this value must be passed, the results should be assigned to a variable, and that variable should be passed.
trans-unit.target: 因为这个函数依赖于当前的作用域来确定参数细节,所以在5.3.0之前的版本中,它不能作为函数参数使用。如果必须传递这个值,则应将结果分配给一个变量,并传递该变量。

trans-unit.source: Because this method uses the modulus operation, numbers which are not positive integers may give unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 因为这种方法使用了模数运算,所以不是正整数的数字可能会得到意想不到的结果。

trans-unit.source: Because variables in PHP can't have dots and spaces in their names, those are converted to underscores. Same applies to naming of respective key names in case of using this function with result parameter.
trans-unit.target: 由于PHP中的变量名称中不能包含点和空格，因此这些变量将转换为下划线。如果将此功能与 result 参数一起使用，则对各个键名称的命名也相同。

trans-unit.source: Before 5.3.6, the only values recognized are TRUE or FALSE, which are the same as setting or not setting the DEBUG_BACKTRACE_PROVIDE_OBJECT option respectively.
trans-unit.target: 在5.3.6之前，只能识别的值为 TRUE 或 FALSE ，分别与设置或未设置 DEBUG_BACKTRACE_PROVIDE_OBJECT 选项相同。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 5.1.0, negative timestamps were not supported under any known version of Windows and some other systems as well. Therefore the range of valid years was limited to 1970 through 2038.
trans-unit.target: 在 PHP 5.1.0 之前,任何已知的 Windows 版本和其他一些系统都不支持负时间戳。因此,有效年份的范围被限制在1970年到2038年。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 5.1.0, this function returned TRUE when text was an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.1.0之前，当 text 为空字符串时，此函数返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 5.3.4, on Windows, sleep() always returns NULL when sleep has occurred, regardless of whether the sleep was interrupted or not.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.3.4之前，在Windows上，无论睡眠是否中断，sleep（）在发生睡眠时总是返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 5.4, referenced variables in param_arr are passed to the function by reference, regardless of whether the function expects the respective parameter to be passed by reference. This form of call-time pass by reference does not emit a deprecation notice, but it is nonetheless deprecated, and has been removed in PHP 5.4. Furthermore, this does not apply to internal functions, for which the function signature is honored. Passing by value when the function expects a parameter by reference results in a warning and having call_user_func() return FALSE (there is, however, an exception for passed values with reference count = 1, such as in literals, as these can be turned into references without ill effects — but also without writes to that value having any effect —; do not rely in this behavior, though, as the reference count is an implementation detail and the soundness of this behavior is questionable).
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.4之前， param_arr 中的引用变量通过引用传递给函数，无论该函数是否希望各个参数都通过引用传递。这种形式的调用时按引用传递不会发出弃用通知，但是仍然不推荐使用，并且已在PHP 5.4中删除。此外，这不适用于内部功能，因此必须遵守功能签名。函数通过引用期望参数时按值传递会导致警告，并使call_user_func（）返回 FALSE （但是，引用计数= 1的传递值有一个例外，例如在文字中，因为这些值可以被转换为引用，而不会产生不良影响-但也不会写入对该值有任何影响-；请不要依赖于此但是，由于引用计数是一个实现细节，因此这种行为的合理性值得怀疑）。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 5.4.20/5.5.4 instead of FALSE you will receive -99999 upon accessing the property.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.4.20 / 5.5.4之前（而不是 FALSE ),您将在访问该属性时收到-99999。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 5.4.42 and 5.5.27, repectively, additional_headers did not have mail header injection protection. Therefore, users must make sure specified headers are safe and contains headers only. i.e. Never start mail body by putting multiple newlines.
trans-unit.target: 分别在PHP 5.4.42和5.5.27之前， additional_headers 没有邮件头注入保护。因此，用户必须确保指定的标头是安全的，并且仅包含标头。即永远不要通过放置多个换行符来开始邮件正文。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 5.5.0, this function is only available if PHP is compiled with the bundled version of the GD library.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.5.0之前,这个函数只有在PHP编译时捆绑了GD库的版本时才可用。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 5.6 neither functions nor constants can be imported via the use statement.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.6之前，不能通过use语句导入函数或常量。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 5.6 the only elements that are affected by use statements are namespaces and class names. In order to shorten a long constant or function, import its containing namespace.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.6之前，受use语句影响的唯一元素是名称空间和类名称。为了缩短长常量或函数，请导入其包含的名称空间。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 7, Exception did not implement the Throwable interface.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 7之前，Exception未实现Throwable接口。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 7.1.0, list() only worked on numerical arrays and assumes the numerical indices start at 0.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 7.1.0之前，list（）仅适用于数字数组，并假定数字索引从0开始。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 7.1.0, rewrite vars set by output_add_rewrite_var() use the same Session module trans sid output buffer. Since PHP 7.1.0, dedicated output buffer is used and output_reset_rewrite_vars() only removes rewrite vars defined by output_add_rewrite_var().
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 7.1.0之前，由output_add_rewrite_var（）设置的重写var 使用相同的Session模块trans sid输出缓冲区。从PHP 7.1.0开始，将使用专用的输出缓冲区，并且output_reset_rewrite_vars（）仅删除由output_add_rewrite_var（）定义的重写var 。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 7.1.0, rewrite vars set by output_add_rewrite_var() use the same Session module trans sid output buffer. Since PHP 7.1.0, dedicated output buffer is used, url_rewriter.tags is used solely for output functions, url_rewriter.hosts is added.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 7.1.0之前，由output_add_rewrite_var（）设置的重写var 使用相同的Session模块trans sid输出缓冲区。从PHP 7.1.0开始，使用了专用的输出缓冲区，url_rewriter.tags仅用于输出函数，添加了url_rewriter.hosts。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 7.2.0 the only means to get a list of supported hash algorithms has been to call hash_algos() which also returns hash algorithms that are not suitable for hash_hmac().
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 7.2.0之前，获取受支持的哈希算法列表的唯一方法是调用hash_algos（），该方法还返回不适合hash_hmac（）的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: Before PHP 7.3, any strings that are not set will silently be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 在 PHP 7.3 之前,任何没有设置的字符串都会被默默跳过。

trans-unit.source: Before discussing the use of namespaces, it is important to understand how PHP knows which namespaced element your code is requesting. A simple analogy can be made between PHP namespaces and a filesystem. There are three ways to access a file in a file system:
trans-unit.target: 在讨论命名空间的使用之前,重要的是要了解 PHP 是如何知道你的代码正在请求哪个命名空间的元素。可以将 PHP 命名空间和文件系统做一个简单的类比。在文件系统中,有三种方法可以访问一个文件。

trans-unit.source: Before this version values of some magic constants were always lowercased. All of them are case-sensitive now (contain names as they were declared).
trans-unit.target: 在这个版本之前,一些魔法常量的值总是小写的。现在所有的常量都是区分大小写的(包含它们声明的名称)。

trans-unit.source: Before v3.0 a second argument &cas_tokens was in use. It was filled with the CAS token values for the found items. The &cas_tokens parameter was removed in v3.0 of the extension. It was replaced with a new flag Memcached::GET_EXTENDED that needs is to be used as the value for flags.
trans-unit.target: 在v3.0之前的 &cas_tokens 中，使用了第二个参数＆cas_tokens。它用找到的项目的CAS令牌值填充。在 &cas_tokens 在延长的V3.0除去参数。它被新的标志 Memcached::GET_EXTENDED 代替，该标志需要用作 flags 的值。

trans-unit.source: Begin checking for events and calling callbacks for the default loop . Returns when a callback calls Ev::stop() method, or the flags are nonzero(in which case the return value is true) or when there are no active watchers which reference the loop( EvWatcher::keepalive() is TRUE), in which case the return value will be FALSE. The return value can generally be interpreted as if TRUE, there is more work left to do .
trans-unit.target: 开始检查事件并为默认循环调用回调。当回调调用Ev :: stop（）方法或标志为非零（在这种情况下，返回值为true）或没有引用循环的活动观察程序（EvWatcher :: keepalive（）为 TRUE ）时返回；在这种情况下，返回值为 FALSE 。返回值一般可以理解为，如果 TRUE ，有剩下要做更多的工作。

trans-unit.source: Begin checking for events and calling callbacks for the current event loop. Returns when a callback calls Ev::stop() method, or the flags are nonzero(in which case the return value is true) or when there are no active watchers which reference the loop( EvWatcher::keepalive() is TRUE), in which case the return value will be FALSE. The return value can generally be interpreted as if TRUE, there is more work left to do .
trans-unit.target: 开始检查事件并为当前事件循环调用回调。当回调调用Ev :: stop（）方法或标志为非零（在这种情况下，返回值为true）或没有引用循环的活动观察程序（EvWatcher :: keepalive（）为 TRUE ）时返回；在这种情况下，返回值为 FALSE 。返回值一般可以理解为，如果 TRUE ，有剩下要做更多的工作。

trans-unit.source: Begin timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 开始时间戳。

trans-unit.source: Begins a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 开始交易。

trans-unit.source: Begins a transaction. Requires the InnoDB engine (it is enabled by default). For additional details about how MySQL transactions work, see » http://dev.mysql.com/doc/mysql/en/commit.html.
trans-unit.target: 开始交易。需要InnoDB引擎（默认情况下启用）。有关MySQL事务如何工作的更多详细信息，请参见»http://dev.mysql.com/doc/mysql/en/commit.html。

trans-unit.source: Behaves as EventBuffer::addBuffer() , except that it moves data to the front of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 表现为EventBuffer :: addBuffer（），除了它将数据移到缓冲区的开头。

trans-unit.source: Behaves as EventBuffer::read() , except that it does not copy the data: it just removes it from the front of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 表现为EventBuffer :: read（），只是它不复制数据：只是将其从缓冲区的前面删除。

trans-unit.source: Behaves just like EventBuffer::read() , but does not drain any data from the buffer. I.e. it copies the first max_bytes bytes from the front of the buffer into data . If there are fewer than max_bytes bytes available, the function copies all the bytes there are.
trans-unit.target: 行为类似于EventBuffer :: read（），但不会从缓冲区中耗尽任何数据。即，它将缓冲区 max_bytes 的前max_bytes个字节复制到 data 中。如果可用字节数少于 max_bytes ，该函数将复制所有字节。

trans-unit.source: Behaves the same as strftime() except that the time returned is Greenwich Mean Time (GMT). For example, when run in Eastern Standard Time (GMT -0500), the first line below prints "Dec 31 1998 20:00:00", while the second prints "Jan 01 1999 01:00:00".
trans-unit.target: 行为与strftime（）相同，除了返回的时间是格林威治标准时间（GMT）。例如，以东部标准时间（GMT -0500）运行时，下面的第一行打印为“ Dec 31 1998 20:00:00”，而第二行打印为“ Jan 01 1999 01:00:00”。

trans-unit.source: Beware of patterns that contain nested indefinite repeats. These can take a long time to run when applied to a string that does not match. Consider the pattern fragment (a+)*
trans-unit.target: 当心包含嵌套的不确定重复的模式。当将它们应用于不匹配的字符串时，它们可能需要很长时间才能运行。考虑模式片段（a +）*

trans-unit.source: Beyond the above advice, note that you can also hook into the serialization and unserialization events on an object using the __sleep() and __wakeup() methods. Using __sleep() also allows you to only serialize a subset of the object's properties.
trans-unit.target: 除了上述建议外，请注意，您还可以使用__sleep（）和__wakeup（）方法来挂接对象的序列化和反序列化事件。使用__sleep（）还允许您仅序列化对象属性的子集。

trans-unit.target: 在传递给mysqli_prepare（）的SQL语句中为参数标记绑定变量。

trans-unit.source: Binding columns in the result set to PHP variables is an effective way to make the data contained in each row immediately available to your application. The following example demonstrates how PDO allows you to bind and retrieve columns with a variety of options and with intelligent defaults.
trans-unit.target: 将结果集中的列绑定到PHP变量中是一种有效的方法,它可以使每行中包含的数据立即在你的应用程序中使用。下面的例子演示了PDO是如何允许你用各种选项和智能默认值来绑定和检索列的。

trans-unit.source: Binding more values than specified is not possible; if more keys exist in input_parameters than in the SQL specified in the PDO::prepare(), then the statement will fail and an error is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 绑定的值不能超过指定的值；如果 input_parameters 中存在的键多于PDO :: prepare（）指定的SQL中的键，则该语句将失败并发出错误。

trans-unit.source: Binds a PHP variable to a corresponding named or question mark placeholder in the SQL statement that was used to prepare the statement. Unlike PDOStatement::bindValue(), the variable is bound as a reference and will only be evaluated at the time that PDOStatement::execute() is called.
trans-unit.target: 将PHP变量绑定到用于准备语句的SQL语句中相应的命名或问号占位符。与PDOStatement :: bindValue（）不同，该变量绑定为引用，并且只会在调用PDOStatement :: execute（）时进行评估。

trans-unit.target: 将一个参数绑定到一个语句变量上。

trans-unit.source: Binds a value to a corresponding named or question mark placeholder in the SQL statement that was used to prepare the statement.
trans-unit.target: 将一个值绑定到用于编写语句的SQL语句中对应的命名或问号占位符上。

trans-unit.target: 用指定的 RDN 和密码绑定到 LDAP 目录。

trans-unit.target: EventListener :: OPT_ *常量的位掩码。请参阅EventListener常量。

trans-unit.source: Bit shifting in PHP is arithmetic. Bits shifted off either end are discarded. Left shifts have zeros shifted in on the right while the sign bit is shifted out on the left, meaning the sign of an operand is not preserved. Right shifts have copies of the sign bit shifted in on the left, meaning the sign of an operand is preserved.
trans-unit.target: PHP中的位移位是一种算术。两端移位的位都被丢弃。左移的零在右边移入,而符号位在左边移出,这意味着操作数的符号不被保留。右移的符号位在左边移入,意味着操作数的符号被保留。

trans-unit.source: Bitfield of the modifiers to get.
trans-unit.target: 位场的修饰符获得。

trans-unit.source: Bitmask consisting of JSON_HEX_QUOT, JSON_HEX_TAG, JSON_HEX_AMP, JSON_HEX_APOS, JSON_NUMERIC_CHECK, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT, JSON_UNESCAPED_SLASHES, JSON_FORCE_OBJECT, JSON_PRESERVE_ZERO_FRACTION, JSON_UNESCAPED_UNICODE, JSON_PARTIAL_OUTPUT_ON_ERROR. The behaviour of these constants is described on the JSON constants page.
trans-unit.target: 位掩码包括 JSON_HEX_QUOT ， JSON_HEX_TAG ， JSON_HEX_AMP ， JSON_HEX_APOS ， JSON_NUMERIC_CHECK ， JSON_PRETTY_PRINT ， JSON_UNESCAPED_SLASHES ， JSON_FORCE_OBJECT ， JSON_PRESERVE_ZERO_FRACTION ， JSON_UNESCAPED_UNICODE ， JSON_PARTIAL_OUTPUT_ON_ERROR 。这些常量的行为在JSON常量页面上进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: Bitmask field which may be set to any combination of connection flags. Currently the select of connection flags is limited to STREAM_CLIENT_CONNECT (default), STREAM_CLIENT_ASYNC_CONNECT and STREAM_CLIENT_PERSISTENT.
trans-unit.target: 位掩码字段，可以将其设置为连接标志的任何组合。当前，连接标志的选择仅限于 STREAM_CLIENT_CONNECT （默认）， STREAM_CLIENT_ASYNC_CONNECT 和 STREAM_CLIENT_PERSISTENT 。

trans-unit.source: Bitmask of CURLPROTO_* values. If used, this bitmask limits what protocols libcurl may use in a transfer that it follows to in a redirect when CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION is enabled. This allows you to limit specific transfers to only be allowed to use a subset of protocols in redirections. By default libcurl will allow all protocols except for FILE and SCP. This is a difference compared to pre-7.19.4 versions which unconditionally would follow to all protocols supported. See also CURLOPT_PROTOCOLS for protocol constant values.
trans-unit.target: CURLPROTO_* 值的位掩码。如果启用了此位掩码，则它会限制libcurl在 CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION 时在重定向中遵循的传输中可以使用的协议。这允许您将特定的传输限制为仅允许在重定向中使用协议的子集。默认情况下，libcurl将允许除FILE和SCP之外的所有协议。与7.19.4之前的版本相比，这是有区别的，后者无条件遵循所有支持的协议。另请参见 CURLOPT_PROTOCOLS 以获取协议常量值。

trans-unit.source: Bitmask of CURLPROTO_* values. If used, this bitmask limits what protocols libcurl may use in the transfer. This allows you to have a libcurl built to support a wide range of protocols but still limit specific transfers to only be allowed to use a subset of them. By default libcurl will accept all protocols it supports. See also CURLOPT_REDIR_PROTOCOLS.
trans-unit.target: CURLPROTO_* 值的位掩码。如果使用此位掩码，则它将限制libcurl可以在传输中使用的协议。这使您可以构建一个libcurl以支持多种协议，但仍将特定的传输限制为仅允许使用它们的子集。默认情况下，libcurl将接受它支持的所有协议。另请参见 CURLOPT_REDIR_PROTOCOLS 。

trans-unit.source: Bitmask of JSON decode options. Currently there are two supported options. The first is JSON_BIGINT_AS_STRING that allows casting big integers to string instead of floats which is the default. The second option is JSON_OBJECT_AS_ARRAY that has the same effect as setting assoc to TRUE.
trans-unit.target: JSON解码选项的位掩码。当前有两个受支持的选项。第一个是 JSON_BIGINT_AS_STRING ，它允许将大整数强制转换为字符串，而不是默认的浮点数。第二个选项是 JSON_OBJECT_AS_ARRAY ，它和设置同样的效果 assoc 命令到 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: By contrast to strtolower(), 'alphabetic' is determined by the Unicode character properties. Thus the behaviour of this function is not affected by locale settings and it can convert any characters that have 'alphabetic' property, such as A-umlaut (Ä).
trans-unit.target: 与strtolower（）相比，“字母”由Unicode字符属性确定。因此，此功能的行为不受语言环境设置的影响，它可以转换任何具有“字母”属性的字符，例如A-umlaut（Ä）。

trans-unit.source: By contrast to strtoupper(), 'alphabetic' is determined by the Unicode character properties. Thus the behaviour of this function is not affected by locale settings and it can convert any characters that have 'alphabetic' property, such as a-umlaut (ä).
trans-unit.target: 与strtoupper（）相比，“字母”由Unicode字符属性确定。因此，此功能的行为不受语言环境设置的影响，它可以转换任何具有“字母”属性的字符，例如a-umlaut（ä）。

trans-unit.source: By contrast to the standard case folding functions such as strtolower() and strtoupper(), case folding is performed on the basis of the Unicode character properties. Thus the behaviour of this function is not affected by locale settings and it can convert any characters that have 'alphabetic' property, such as A-umlaut (Ä).
trans-unit.target: 与标准的大小写折叠功能（例如strtolower（）和strtoupper（））相比，大小写折叠是基于Unicode字符属性执行的。因此，此功能的行为不受语言环境设置的影响，它可以转换任何具有“字母”属性的字符，例如A-umlaut（Ä）。

trans-unit.source: By default Libevent turns underlying file descriptors, or sockets, to non-blocking mode. This flag tells Libevent to leave them in blocking mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,Libevent 将底层文件描述符或套接字转为非阻塞模式。这个标志告诉 Libevent 让它们处于阻塞模式。

trans-unit.source: By default all events are scheduled with the same priority (npriorities/2). Using event_base_priority_init() you can change the number of event priority levels and then set a desired priority for each event.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有事件都以相同的优先级（ npriorities / 2）进行调度。使用event_base_priority_init（）可以更改事件优先级的数量，然后为每个事件设置所需的优先级。

trans-unit.source: By default an array is returned. If return_float is set, then a float is returned.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，返回一个数组。如果设置了 return_float ，则返回浮点数。

trans-unit.source: By default it checks all include paths to contain filenames built up by the lowercase class name appended by the filename extensions .inc and .php.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,它检查所有包含路径的文件名,这些文件名是由文件名扩展名.inc和.php附加的小写类名建立的。

trans-unit.source: By default on some platforms, once a listener socket is closed, no other socket can bind to the same port until a while has passed. Setting this option makes Libevent mark the socket as reusable, so that once it is closed, another socket can be opened to listen on the same port.
trans-unit.target: 在某些平台上,默认情况下,一旦一个监听器套接字被关闭,其他套接字就不能绑定到同一个端口,直到过了一段时间。设置这个选项会让Libevent将该套接字标记为可重用,这样一旦它被关闭,就可以打开另一个套接字来监听同一个端口。

trans-unit.source: By default target must match a particular pixel color exactly. However, in many cases two colors may differ by a small amount. The fuzz member of image defines how much tolerance is acceptable to consider two colors as the same. This parameter represents the variation on the quantum range.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,目标必须与特定的像素颜色完全匹配。然而,在许多情况下,两种颜色可能相差很小。image的fuzz成员定义了可以接受多少公差来认为两种颜色是一样的。这个参数代表了量子范围上的变化。

trans-unit.source: By default the Memcached instances are destroyed at the end of the request. To create an instance that persists between requests, use persistent_id to specify a unique ID for the instance. All instances created with the same persistent_id will share the same connection.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Memcached实例在请求结束时被销毁。要创建在请求之间 persistent_id 存在的实例，请使用persistent_id为该实例指定唯一的ID。使用相同的 persistent_id 创建的所有实例将共享相同的连接。

trans-unit.source: By default the tables name that field belongs to is returned but if oid_only is set to TRUE, then the oid will instead be returned.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，返回字段所属的表名，但是如果 oid_only 设置为 TRUE ，则将返回oid。

trans-unit.source: By default this includes the following methods: GET , POST , HEAD , PUT , DELETE . See EventHttpRequest::CMD_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，这包括以下方法：GET，POST，HEAD，PUT，DELETE。请参见EventHttpRequest :: CMD_ *常量。

trans-unit.source: By default, data_is_url is FALSE. Use TRUE to specify that data is a path or URL to an XML document instead of string data.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， data_is_url 为 FALSE 。使用 TRUE 可以指定 data 是XML文档的路径或URL，而不是字符串数据。

trans-unit.source: By default, PHP_QUERY_RFC1738.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， PHP_QUERY_RFC1738 。

trans-unit.source: By default, STDOUT and STDERR have the VT100 feature enabled.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， STDOUT 和 STDERR 启用了VT100功能。

trans-unit.source: By default, Yaf_Loader assume all library (class defined script) store in the global library directory, which is defined in the php.ini(yaf.library).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Yaf_Loader假定所有库（类定义的脚本）存储在全局库目录中，该目录在php.ini（yaf.library）中定义。

trans-unit.source: By default, dns_get_record() will search for any resource records associated with hostname. To limit the query, specify the optional type parameter. May be any one of the following: DNS_A, DNS_CNAME, DNS_HINFO, DNS_CAA, DNS_MX, DNS_NS, DNS_PTR, DNS_SOA, DNS_TXT, DNS_AAAA, DNS_SRV, DNS_NAPTR, DNS_A6, DNS_ALL or DNS_ANY.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，dns_get_record（）将搜索与 hostname 关联的任何资源记录。要限制查询，请指定可选的 type 参数。可以是以下任意一项： DNS_A ， DNS_CNAME ， DNS_HINFO ， DNS_CAA ， DNS_MX ， DNS_NS ， DNS_PTR ， DNS_SOA ， DNS_TXT ， DNS_AAAA ， DNS_SRV ， DNS_NAPTR ， DNS_A6 ， DNS_ALL 或 DNS_ANY 。

trans-unit.source: By default, microtime() returns a string in the form "msec sec", where sec is the number of seconds since the Unix epoch (0:00:00 January 1,1970 GMT), and msec measures microseconds that have elapsed since sec and is also expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，microtime（）返回一个字符串，形式为“毫秒”，其中sec是自Unix时代（格林尼治标准时间1970年1月1日0:00:00）以来的秒数，毫秒是自sec以来经过的毫秒数。并且也以秒表示。

trans-unit.source: By default, querySingle() returns the value of the first column returned by the query. If entire_row is TRUE, then it returns an array of the entire first row.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，querySingle（）返回查询返回的第一列的值。如果 entire_row 为 TRUE ，则它将返回整个第一行的数组。

trans-unit.source: By default, stream_filter_append() will attach the filter to the read filter chain if the file was opened for reading (i.e. File Mode: r, and/or +). The filter will also be attached to the write filter chain if the file was opened for writing (i.e. File Mode: w, a, and/or +). STREAM_FILTER_READ, STREAM_FILTER_WRITE, and/or STREAM_FILTER_ALL can also be passed to the read_write parameter to override this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果打开文件进行读取（例如，文件模式：r和/或+），stream_filter_append（）会将过滤器附加到读取的过滤器链上。如果打开了用于写入的文件（即文件模式：w，a和/或+），则该过滤器还将附加到写过滤器链上。 STREAM_FILTER_READ ， STREAM_FILTER_WRITE ，和/或 STREAM_FILTER_ALL 也可以传递给 read_write 参数来覆盖此行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, stream_filter_prepend() will attach the filter to the read filter chain if the file was opened for reading (i.e. File Mode: r, and/or +). The filter will also be attached to the write filter chain if the file was opened for writing (i.e. File Mode: w, a, and/or +). STREAM_FILTER_READ, STREAM_FILTER_WRITE, and/or STREAM_FILTER_ALL can also be passed to the read_write parameter to override this behavior. See stream_filter_append() for an example of using this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果打开文件进行读取（例如，文件模式：r和/或+），stream_filter_prepend（）会将过滤器附加到读取过滤器链。如果打开了用于写入的文件（即文件模式：w，a和/或+），则该过滤器还将附加到写过滤器链上。 STREAM_FILTER_READ ， STREAM_FILTER_WRITE ，和/或 STREAM_FILTER_ALL 也可以传递给 read_write 参数来覆盖此行为。有关使用此参数的示例，请参见stream_filter_append（）。

trans-unit.source: By default, version_compare() returns -1 if the first version is lower than the second, 0 if they are equal, and 1 if the second is lower.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，version_compare（）返回-1如果第一版本比第二下，0如果它们相等，和1如果第二较低。

trans-unit.source: By default, PCRE treats the subject string as consisting of a single "line" of characters (even if it actually contains several newlines). The "start of line" metacharacter (^) matches only at the start of the string, while the "end of line" metacharacter ($) matches only at the end of the string, or before a terminating newline (unless D modifier is set). This is the same as Perl. When this modifier is set, the "start of line" and "end of line" constructs match immediately following or immediately before any newline in the subject string, respectively, as well as at the very start and end. This is equivalent to Perl's /m modifier. If there are no "\n" characters in a subject string, or no occurrences of ^ or $ in a pattern, setting this modifier has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，PCRE将主题字符串视为由单个“行”字符组成（即使实际上包含多个换行符）。 “行首”元字符（^）仅在字符串的开头匹配，而“行尾”元字符（$）仅在字符串的末尾或终止换行符之前匹配（除非设置了D修饰符） ）。这与Perl相同。设置此修饰符后，“行首”和“行尾”结构分别与主题字符串中的任何换行符紧接或紧随其后，以及最开始和结尾处都匹配。这等效于Perl的/ m修饰符。如果主题字符串中没有“ \ n”字符，或者在模式中没有出现^或$，设置此修饰符无效。

trans-unit.source: By default, PHP will coerce values of the wrong type into the expected scalar type if possible. For example, a function that is given an integer for a parameter that expects a string will get a variable of type string.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，PHP将在可能的情况下将错误类型的值强制转换为预期的标量类型。例如，一个为期望字符串的参数提供整数的函数将获得string类型的变量。

trans-unit.source: By default, a whitespace character is any character that the C library function isspace() recognizes, though it is possible to compile PCRE with alternative character type tables. Normally isspace() matches space, formfeed, newline, carriage return, horizontal tab, and vertical tab. Perl 5 no longer includes vertical tab in its set of whitespace characters. The \v escape that was in the Perl documentation for a long time was never in fact recognized. However, the character itself was treated as whitespace at least up to 5.002. In 5.004 and 5.005 it does not match \s.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,空白字符是C库函数isspace()识别的任何字符,尽管可以用其他字符类型表编译PCRE。通常isspace()会匹配空格、formfeed、换行、回车、水平制表符和垂直制表符。Perl 5 不再将垂直制表符包含在它的空白字符集中。在 Perl 文档中出现了很长时间的 v/v 转义符实际上从未被识别。然而,至少在 5.002 之前,这个字符本身是被视为空白字符的。在 5.004 和 5.005 中,它与 \s 不匹配。

trans-unit.source: By default, all of the superglobals are available but there are directives that affect this availability. For further information, refer to the documentation for variables_order.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有超全局变量都可用，但是有些指令会影响此可用性。有关更多信息，请参阅variables_order的文档。

trans-unit.source: By default, auto-commit is on for a connection. Disabling auto-commit is equivalent with starting a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,连接的自动提交是开启的。禁用自动提交相当于启动一个事务。

trans-unit.source: By default, function arguments are passed by value (so that if the value of the argument within the function is changed, it does not get changed outside of the function). To allow a function to modify its arguments, they must be passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,函数的参数是通过值传递的(所以如果函数中的参数值被改变,它不会在函数之外被改变)。要允许函数修改其参数,必须通过引用传递。

trans-unit.source: By default, the sqlsrv_connect() uses connection pooling to improve connection performance. To turn off connection pooling (i.e. force a new connection on each call), set the "ConnectionPooling" option in the $connectionOptions array to 0 (or FALSE). For more information, see » SQLSRV Connection Pooling.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，sqlsrv_connect（）使用连接池来提高连接性能。要关闭连接池（即在每次调用时强制建立新连接），请将$ connectionOptions数组中的“ ConnectionPooling”选项设置为0（或 FALSE ）。有关更多信息，请参见»SQLSRV连接池。

trans-unit.source: By default, the extension is .phar.gz or .phar.bz2 for compressing phar archives, and .phar.tar.gz or .phar.tar.bz2 for compressing tar archives. For decompressing, the default file extensions are .phar and .phar.tar.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，扩展名是.phar.gz或.phar.bz2压缩Phar归档，并.phar.tar.gz或.phar.tar.bz2压缩tar归档。对于解压缩，默认文件扩展名为.phar和.phar.tar。

trans-unit.source: By default, the extension is .tar.gz or .tar.bz2 for compressing a tar, and .tar for decompressing.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，扩展名是.tar.gz或.tar.bz2（用于压缩tar），扩展名为.tar（用于解压缩）。

trans-unit.source: By default, the information in your system openssl.conf is used to initialize the request; you can specify a configuration file section by setting the config_section_section key of configargs. You can also specify an alternative openssl configuration file by setting the value of the config key to the path of the file you want to use. The following keys, if present in configargs behave as their equivalents in the openssl.conf, as listed in the table below.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，系统openssl.conf中的信息用于初始化请求。您可以通过设置 configargs 的config_section_section键来指定配置文件段。您还可以通过将config键的值设置为要使用的文件的路径来指定其他openssl配置文件。以下键，如果存在于 configargs 表现为它们在等效openssl.conf，如表中列出如下。

trans-unit.source: By default, the quantifiers are "greedy", that is, they match as much as possible (up to the maximum number of permitted times), without causing the rest of the pattern to fail. The classic example of where this gives problems is in trying to match comments in C programs. These appear between the sequences /* and */ and within the sequence, individual * and / characters may appear. An attempt to match C comments by applying the pattern /\*.*\*/ to the string /* first comment */ not comment /* second comment */ fails, because it matches the entire string due to the greediness of the .* item.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，量词是“贪婪的”，也就是说，它们尽可能地匹配（最多允许的次数），而不会导致模式的其余部分失败。产生问题的经典示例是尝试匹配C程序中的注释。这些出现在序列/ *和* /之间，并且在序列内，可能会出现单个*和/字符。通过将模式/\*.*\*/应用于字符串/ *第一个注释* /不注释/ *第二个注释* /来匹配C个注释的尝试失败，因为由于的贪婪，它与整个字符串匹配。 *项。

trans-unit.source: By default, the serialization method used is internal to PHP, and is not the same as serialize(). The serialization method can be set using session.serialize_handler.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所使用的序列化方法在PHP内部，并且与serialize（）不同。可以使用session.serialize_handler设置序列化方法。

trans-unit.source: By default, the sorted order is alphabetical in ascending order. If the optional sorting_order is set to SCANDIR_SORT_DESCENDING, then the sort order is alphabetical in descending order. If it is set to SCANDIR_SORT_NONE then the result is unsorted.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，排序顺序按字母升序排列。如果可选的 sorting_order 设置为 SCANDIR_SORT_DESCENDING ，则排序顺序按字母顺序降序排列。如果将其设置为 SCANDIR_SORT_NONE ,则结果将不排序。

trans-unit.source: By default, the unserialization method used is internal to PHP, and is not the same as unserialize(). The serialization method can be set using session.serialize_handler.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所使用的反序列化方法是PHP的内部方法，与unserialize（）不同。可以使用session.serialize_handler设置序列化方法。

trans-unit.source: By default, this value is application.directory . "/library", you can change this either in the application.ini(application.library) or call to Yaf_Loader::setLibraryPath()
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此值为application.directory。“ / library”，您可以在application.ini（application.library）或调用Yaf_Loader :: setLibraryPath（）中进行更改

trans-unit.source: By default, variables are always assigned by value. That is to say, when you assign an expression to a variable, the entire value of the original expression is copied into the destination variable. This means, for instance, that after assigning one variable's value to another, changing one of those variables will have no effect on the other. For more information on this kind of assignment, see the chapter on Expressions.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，变量始终按值分配。也就是说，在将表达式分配给变量时，原始表达式的整个值都将复制到目标变量中。例如，这意味着将一个变量的值分配给另一个变量后，更改其中一个变量不会对另一个变量产生影响。有关此类分配的更多信息，请参见“ 表达式 ”一章。

trans-unit.source: By default, warnings generated on a call to any SQLSRV function are treated as errors. This means that if a warning occurs on a call to a SQLSRV function, the function returns FALSE. However, warnings that correspond to SQLSTATE values 01000, 01001, 01003, and 01S02 are never treated as errors. For information about changing this behavior, see sqlsrv_configure() and the WarningsReturnAsErrors setting.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，对任何SQLSRV函数的调用生成的警告均被视为错误。这意味着，如果在调用SQLSRV函数时发生警告，则该函数返回 FALSE 。但是，与SQLSTATE值01000、01001、01003和01S02对应的警告永远不会被视为错误。有关更改此行为的信息，请参见sqlsrv_configure（）和WarningsReturnAsErrors设置。

trans-unit.source: By default, when the bufferevent is set up to be threadsafe, the buffer event’s locks are held whenever the any user-provided callback is invoked. Setting this option makes Libevent release the buffer event’s lock when it’s invoking the callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将bufferevent设置为线程安全时，只要调用任何用户提供的回调，缓冲区事件的锁就会被保存。设置此选项可使Libevent在调用回调时释放缓冲区事件的锁。

trans-unit.source: By invoking the methods provided by the NumberFormatter class, you can format numbers, currencies, and percentages according to the specified or default locale. NumberFormatter is locale-sensitive so you need to create a new NumberFormatter for each locale. NumberFormatter methods format primitive-type numbers, such as double and output the number as a locale-specific string.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用NumberFormatter类提供的方法,您可以根据指定的或默认的本地环境对数字、货币和百分比进行格式化。NumberFormatter是本地敏感的,因此您需要为每个本地语言创建一个新的NumberFormatter。NumberFormatter方法可以格式化基元类型的数字,如双数,并将数字输出为特定于本地的字符串。

trans-unit.source: By ksorting patterns and replacements, we should get what we wanted.
trans-unit.target: 通过对模式的排序和替换,我们应该可以得到自己想要的东西。

trans-unit.source: By passing a reference as third argument, similar_text() will calculate the similarity in percent, by dividing the result of similar_text() by the average of the lengths of the given strings times 100.
trans-unit.target: 通过将引用作为第三个参数传递，相类似的文本（）将相似性的百分比计算出来，方法是将相类似的文本（）的结果除以给定字符串长度的平均值乘以100。

trans-unit.target: 通过将 process_sections 参数设置为 TRUE ，您将获得一个多维数组，其中包含节名称和设置。 process_sections 的默认值为 FALSE

trans-unit.source: Calculate greatest common divisor of a and b. The result is always positive even if either of, or both, input operands are negative.
trans-unit.target: 计算 a 和 b 的最大公约数。即使输入操作数之一或全部为负，结果始终为正。

trans-unit.target: 计算的斜边长度

trans-unit.source: Calculates n modulo d. The result is always non-negative, the sign of d is ignored.

trans-unit.source: Calculates bitwise AND of two GMP numbers.

trans-unit.source: Calculates bitwise exclusive OR (XOR) of two GMP numbers.
trans-unit.target: 计算两个GMP数字的位独占OR(XOR)。

trans-unit.source: Calculates bitwise inclusive OR of two GMP numbers.

trans-unit.source: Calculates factorial (a!) of a.

trans-unit.source: Calculates g, s, and t, such that a*s + b*t = g = gcd(a,b), where gcd is the greatest common divisor. Returns an array with respective elements g, s and t.
trans-unit.target: 计算g，s和t，使a * s + b * t = g = gcd（a，b），其中gcd是最大公约数。返回包含元素g，s和t的数组。

trans-unit.source: Calculates remainder of the integer division of n by d. The remainder has the sign of the n argument, if not zero.
trans-unit.target: 计算 n 除以 d 的整数除法的余数。其余部分带有 n 参数的符号（如果不为零）。

trans-unit.source: Calculates square root of a.
trans-unit.target: 计算平方根 a 。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the MD5 hash of str using the » RSA Data Security, Inc. MD5 Message-Digest Algorithm, and returns that hash.
trans-unit.target: 使用»RSA Data Security，Inc. MD5消息摘要算法计算 str 的MD5哈希，并返回该哈希。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the MD5 hash of the file specified by the filename parameter using the » RSA Data Security, Inc. MD5 Message-Digest Algorithm, and returns that hash. The hash is a 32-character hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: 使用»RSA Data Security，Inc. MD5消息摘要算法，计算 filename 参数指定的文件的MD5哈希，并返回该哈希。哈希是32个字符的十六进制数字。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the group access list for the user specified in name.
trans-unit.target: 计算名称中指定的用户的组访问列表。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the metaphone key of str.
trans-unit.target: 计算 str 的变音键。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the sha1 hash of str using the » US Secure Hash Algorithm 1.
trans-unit.target: 使用»美国安全哈希算法1计算 str 的sha1哈希。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the sha1 hash of the file specified by filename using the » US Secure Hash Algorithm 1, and returns that hash. The hash is a 40-character hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: 使用»US Secure Hash Algorithm 1计算文件 filename 指定的文件的sha1哈希，并返回该哈希。哈希是一个40个字符的十六进制数字。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the size of the buffer that should be allocated for receiving the ancillary data.
trans-unit.target: 计算应分配给接收辅助数据的缓冲区大小。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the soundex key of str.
trans-unit.target: 计算 str 的soundex键。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field encompassing the information in IntlCalendar::FIELD_HOUR_OF_DAY, IntlCalendar::FIELD_MINUTE, IntlCalendar::FIELD_SECOND and IntlCalendar::FIELD_MILLISECOND. Range is from the 0 to 24 * 3600 * 1000 - 1. It is not the amount of milliseconds ellapsed in the day since on DST transitions it will have discontinuities analog to those of the wall time.
trans-unit.target: 日历字段包含 IntlCalendar::FIELD_HOUR_OF_DAY ， IntlCalendar::FIELD_MINUTE ， IntlCalendar::FIELD_SECOND 和 IntlCalendar::FIELD_MILLISECOND 。范围是0到24 * 3600 * 1000-1。这不是一天中经过的毫秒数，因为在DST转换中，其不连续性类似于墙上时间的不连续性。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for a modified Julian day number. It is different from a conventional Julian day number in that its transitions occur at local zone midnight rather than at noon UTC. It uniquely identifies a date.
trans-unit.target: 修改后的朱利安日数的日历字段。它不同于传统的朱利安日数,它的转换发生在当地区域的午夜,而不是在UTC的中午。它是唯一的日期标识。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for a year number representation that is continuous across eras. For the Gregorian calendar, the value of this field matches that of IntlCalendar::FIELD_YEAR for AD years; a BC year y is represented by -y + 1.
trans-unit.target: 跨多个年份的年份数字表示形式的日历字段。对于公历，此字段的值与AD年的 IntlCalendar::FIELD_YEAR 值匹配；BC年y由-y + 1表示。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the day of the month. The same as IntlCalendar::FIELD_DAY_OF_MONTH, which has a clearer name.
trans-unit.target: 月中某天的日历字段。与 IntlCalendar::FIELD_DAY_OF_MONTH 相同，但名称更清晰。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the day of the week. Its values start with 1 (Sunday, see IntlCalendar::DOW_SUNDAY and subsequent constants) and the last valid value is 7 (Saturday).
trans-unit.target: 星期几的日历字段。它的值以1（星期日，请参阅 IntlCalendar::DOW_SUNDAY 及其后续常量）开头，最后一个有效值为7（星期六）。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the day of the year. For the Gregorian calendar, starts with 1 and ends with 365 or 366.
trans-unit.target: 一年中某天的日历字段。对于公历，以 1 开头，以 365 或 366 结尾。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the daylight saving time offset of the calendarʼs timezone, in milliseconds, if active for calendarʼs time.
trans-unit.target: 如果日历时间有效,日历时区的夏令时偏移量的日历字段,单位为毫秒。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the full (24h) hour of the day. Valid values are 0 to 23.
trans-unit.target: 全天（24h）小时的日历字段。有效值为0到23。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the hour, without specifying whether itʼs in the morning or in the afternoon. Valid values are 0 to 11.
trans-unit.target: 小时的日历字段，不指定是上午还是下午。有效值为0到11。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the localized day of the week. This is a value betwen 1 and 7, 1 being used for the day of the week that matches the value returned by IntlCalendar::getFirstDayOfWeek().
trans-unit.target: 本地化星期几的日历字段。这是介于1和7之间的值，该1用于一周中的一天，该值与IntlCalendar :: getFirstDayOfWeek（）返回的值匹配。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the minutes component of the time.
trans-unit.target: 时间的分钟部分的日历字段。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the month. The month sequence is zero-based, so Janurary (here used to signify the first month of the calendar; this may be called another name, such as Muharram in the Islamic calendar) is represented by 0, February by 1, …, December by 11 and, for calendars that have it, the 13th or leap month by 12.
trans-unit.target: 该月的日历字段。月序列是从零开始的，因此Janurary（此处用来表示日历的第一个月；可以称为另一个名称，例如伊斯兰日历中的Muharram）用0表示，2月用1表示，…，12月用11，对于有日历的日历，则是13或leap月12。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the number of the week of the month. This depends on which day of the week is deemed to start the week and the minimal number of days in a week.
trans-unit.target: 月中第几周的日历字段。这取决于一周中的哪一天和一周中的最少天数。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the number of the week of the year. This depends on which day of the week is deemed to start the week and the minimal number of days in a week.
trans-unit.target: 一年中星期几的日历字段。这取决于一周中的哪一天和一周中的最少天数。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the seconds component of the time.
trans-unit.target: 时间的秒数部分的日历字段。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field for the year. This is not unique across eras. If the calendar type has more than one era, generally the minimum value for this field will be 1.
trans-unit.target: 年的日历字段。这在各个时代都不是唯一的。如果日历类型具有多个时代，则此字段的最小值通常为1。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field indicating the raw offset of the timezone, in milliseconds. The raw offset is the timezone offset, excluding any offset due to daylight saving time.
trans-unit.target: 日历字段表示时区的原始偏移,单位为毫秒。原始偏移量是时区的偏移量,不包括因夏令时而产生的任何偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field indicating whether a time is before noon (value 0, AM) or after (1). Midnight is AM, noon is PM.
trans-unit.target: 日历字段，指示时间是中午之前（值0，AM）还是之后（1）。午夜是上午，中午是下午。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field numerically representing an era, for instance 1 for AD and 0 for BC in the Gregorian/Julian calendars and 235 for the Heisei (平成) era in the Japanese calendar. Not all calendars have more than one era.
trans-unit.target: 数字表示时代的日历字段，例如在公历和朱利安日历中，AD 表示1，BC表示0，在日本日历中，平成（Heisei）时代表示235。并非所有日历都具有多个时代。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field representing the year for week of year purposes.
trans-unit.target: 表示年份的日历字段，用于一年中的第几周。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field the milliseconds component of the time.
trans-unit.target: 日历字段中时间的毫秒部分。

trans-unit.source: Calendar field whose value is 1 for indicating a leap month and 0 otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 日历字段，其值为1表示indicating日，否则为0。

trans-unit.source: Calendar information is returned as an array containing the elements calname, calsymbol, month, abbrevmonth and maxdaysinmonth. The names of the different calendars which can be used as calendar are as follows:
trans-unit.target: 日历信息以包含元素calname，calsymbol，month，abbrevmonth和maxdaysinmonth的数组的形式返回。可以用作 calendar 的不同日历的名称如下：

trans-unit.source: Calendar to convert from, one of CAL_GREGORIAN, CAL_JULIAN, CAL_JEWISH or CAL_FRENCH.
trans-unit.target: 要从 CAL_GREGORIAN ， CAL_JULIAN ， CAL_JEWISH 或 CAL_FRENCH 之一转换的日历。

trans-unit.source: Calendar to convert to
trans-unit.target: 转换成日历

trans-unit.source: Calendar to return information for. If no calendar is specified information about all calendars is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回要返回的日历信息。如果没有指定日历,则返回所有日历的信息。

trans-unit.source: Calendar to use for calculation
trans-unit.target: 用于计算的日历

trans-unit.source: Calendar to use for formatting or parsing. The default value is NULL, which corresponds to IntlDateFormatter::GREGORIAN. This can either be one of the IntlDateFormatter calendar constants or an IntlCalendar. Any IntlCalendar object passed will be clone; it will not be changed by the IntlDateFormatter. This will determine the calendar type used (gregorian, islamic, persian, etc.) and, if NULL is given for the timezone parameter, also the timezone used.
trans-unit.target: 用于格式化或解析的日历。默认值为 NULL ，它对应于 IntlDateFormatter::GREGORIAN 。这可以是一个IntlDateFormatter日历常量或IntlCalendar。传递的任何IntlCalendar对象都将被克隆；它不会被IntlDateFormatter更改。这将确定所使用的日历类型（公历，伊斯兰，波斯等），如果 timezone 参数为 NULL ，则还将确定所使用的时区。

trans-unit.source: Call IntlCalendar::createInstance() instead.
trans-unit.target: 改为调用IntlCalendar :: createInstance（）。

trans-unit.source: Call the callback when a status change for process ID pid (or any PID if pid is 0 ) has been received(a status change happens when the process terminates or is killed, or, when trace is TRUE, additionally when it is stopped or continued). In other words, when the process receives a SIGCHLD , Ev will fetch the outstanding exit/wait status for all changed/zombie children and call the callback.
trans-unit.target: 当收到进程ID pid （或任何PID，如果 pid 为 0 ）的状态更改时（状态发生在进程终止或被终止时，或者在 trace 为 TRUE 时，另外在停止或继续时发生，则调用回调））。换句话说，当进程收到 SIGCHLD 时，Ev将获取所有已更改/僵尸子级的未完成退出/等待状态，并调用回调。

trans-unit.source: Call to return a result set from a prepared statement query.
trans-unit.target: 调用来返回准备好的语句查询的结果集。

trans-unit.target: Callback

trans-unit.target: ob_start（）的回调函数可修复缓冲区。

trans-unit.target: 当匹配事件发生时要调用的回调函数。

trans-unit.source: Callback to invoke where there is data to read, or NULL if no callback is desired.
trans-unit.target: 回调以调用要读取数据的位置；如果不需要回调，则为NULL。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks can be denoted by callable type hint as of PHP 5.4. This documentation used callback type information for the same purpose.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.4开始，回调可以通过可调用类型提示来表示。本文档出于相同目的使用了回调类型信息。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks registered with functions such as call_user_func() and call_user_func_array() will not be called if there is an uncaught exception thrown in a previous callback.
trans-unit.target: 如果在先前的回调中引发了未捕获的异常，则不会调用使用诸如call_user_func（）和call_user_func_array（）之类的功能注册的回调。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks registered with functions such as call_user_func() and call_user_func_array() will not be called if there is an uncaught exception thrown in a previous callback.
trans-unit.target: 如果在先前的回调中引发了未捕获的异常，则不会调用使用诸如call_user_func（）和call_user_func_array（）之类的功能注册的回调。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks registered with functions such as call_user_func() and call_user_func_array() will not be called if there is an uncaught exception thrown in a previous callback.
trans-unit.target: 如果在先前的回调中引发了未捕获的异常，则不会调用使用诸如call_user_func（）和call_user_func_array（）之类的功能注册的回调。

trans-unit.source: Called during unserialization of the object.
trans-unit.target: 在对象的非序列化过程中调用。

trans-unit.source: Called for each element to test whether it has children.
trans-unit.target: 调用,用于测试每个元素是否有子元素。

trans-unit.source: Called when closing the stream wrapper, right before streamWrapper::stream_flush().
trans-unit.target: 在关闭流包装器时调用，就在streamWrapper :: stream_flush（）之前。

trans-unit.source: Called when end recursing one level.
trans-unit.target: 当结束递归一级时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when iteration begins (after the first RecursiveIteratorIterator::rewind() call.
trans-unit.target: 在迭代开始时调用（在第一个RecursiveIteratorIterator :: rewind（）调用之后。

trans-unit.source: Called when iteration begins (after the first RecursiveTreeIterator::rewind() call).
trans-unit.target: 在迭代开始时调用（在第一次RecursiveTreeIterator :: rewind（）调用之后）。

trans-unit.source: Called when opening the stream wrapper, right before streamWrapper::stream_open().
trans-unit.target: 在打开流包装器时在streamWrapper :: stream_open（）之前调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when recursing one level down.
trans-unit.target: 当向下循环一层时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the iteration ends (when RecursiveIteratorIterator::valid() first returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 在迭代结束时调用（当RecursiveIteratorIterator :: valid（）首先返回 FALSE 时调用）。

trans-unit.source: Called when the iteration ends (when RecursiveTreeIterator::valid() first returns FALSE)
trans-unit.target: 在迭代结束时调用（当RecursiveTreeIterator :: valid（）首先返回 FALSE 时）

trans-unit.source: Called when the next element is available.
trans-unit.target: 当下一个元素可用时调用。

trans-unit.source: Calling exit() after php_check_syntax() resulted in a Segfault.
trans-unit.target: 在php_check_syntax （）之后调用exit（）导致Segfault。

trans-unit.source: Calling suspend / resume has the side effect of updating the event loop time(see Ev::nowUpdate() ).
trans-unit.target: 调用suspend / resume具有更新事件循环时间的副作用（请参阅Ev :: nowUpdate（））。

trans-unit.source: Calling EventBuffer::pullup() with a large size can be quite slow, since it potentially needs to copy the entire buffer's contents.
trans-unit.target: 大型调用EventBuffer :: pullup（）可能会很慢，因为它可能需要复制整个缓冲区的内容。

trans-unit.source: Calling Generator::next() is equivalent to calling Generator::send() with NULL as argument.
trans-unit.target: 调用Generator :: next（）等效于以 NULL 作为参数调用Generator :: send（）。

trans-unit.source: Calling PDO::prepare() and PDOStatement::execute() for statements that will be issued multiple times with different parameter values optimizes the performance of your application by allowing the driver to negotiate client and/or server side caching of the query plan and meta information, and helps to prevent SQL injection attacks by eliminating the need to manually quote the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 为将使用不同参数值多次发出的语句调用PDO :: prepare（）和PDOStatement :: execute（）可通过允许驱动程序协商查询计划的客户端和/或服务器端缓存来优化应用程序的性能，并元信息，并消除了手动引用参数的需要，从而有助于防止SQL注入攻击。

trans-unit.source: Calling get_class_vars() will expose all properties, as when converting an object to a class.
trans-unit.target: 调用get_class_vars（）将公开所有属性，就像将对象转换为类一样。

trans-unit.source: Calling get_class_vars() will now expose all the properties as an array, unlike previous behaviour where protected and private properties were prefixed with nul bytes.
trans-unit.target: 现在，调用get_class_vars（）会将所有属性公开为数组，这与以前的行为不同，受保护的属性和私有属性以nul字节为前缀。

trans-unit.target: 调用PHP函数
