trans-unit.target: 调用家长的功能

trans-unit.source: Calling the constructor with no parameters is the same as calling mysqli_init().
trans-unit.target: 调用无参数的构造函数与调用mysqli_init（）相同。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function tells the SSL to renegotiate, and the buffer event to invoke appropriate callbacks. This is an advanced topic; this should be generally avoided unless one really knows what he/she does, especially since many SSL versions have had known security issues related to renegotiation.
trans-unit.target: 调用这个函数告诉SSL重新协商,缓冲区事件调用适当的回调。这是一个高级话题;除非真的知道自己在做什么,否则一般应该避免这样做,尤其是许多SSL版本都存在与重新协商有关的已知安全问题。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method directly is deprecated. Usually, SOAP functions can be called as methods of the SoapClient object; in situations where this is not possible or additional options are needed, use SoapClient::__soapCall().
trans-unit.target: 不建议直接调用此方法。通常，可以将SOAP函数称为SoapClient对象的方法。在无法执行此操作或需要其他选项的情况下，请使用SoapClient :: __ soapCall（）。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method from foreach triggers warning "Illegal type returned".
trans-unit.target: 从foreach调用此方法将触发警告“返回非法类型”。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is optional. The SoapClient uses the endpoint from the WSDL file by default.
trans-unit.target: 调用这个方法是可选的。SoapClient默认使用WSDL文件中的端点。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will affect all following calls to SoapClient methods.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法将影响随后对SoapClient方法的所有调用。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will replace any previous values.
trans-unit.target: 调用本方法将替换之前的任何值。

trans-unit.source: Calls a function for every element in an iterator.
trans-unit.target: 为迭代器中的每个元素调用一个函数。

trans-unit.source: Calls a user defined function or method given by the function parameter, with the following arguments. This function must be called within a method context, it can't be used outside a class. It uses the late static binding.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下参数调用由 function 参数给定的用户定义函数或方法。此函数必须在方法上下文中调用，不能在类外部使用。它使用后期静态绑定。

trans-unit.source: Calls a user defined function or method given by the function parameter. This function must be called within a method context, it can't be used outside a class. It uses the late static binding. All arguments of the forwarded method are passed as values, and as an array, similarly to call_user_func_array().
trans-unit.target: 调用 function 参数给定的用户定义函数或方法。此函数必须在方法上下文中调用，不能在类外部使用。它使用后期静态绑定。与call_user_func_array（）类似，转发的方法的所有参数都作为值和数组传递。

trans-unit.source: Calls the callback given by the first parameter and passes the remaining parameters as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 调用第一个参数给定的 callback ，并将其余参数作为参数传递。

trans-unit.source: Calls the callback given by the first parameter with the parameters in param_arr.
trans-unit.target: 使用 param_arr 中的参数调用第一个参数给定的 callback 。

trans-unit.source: Calls the registered consumer handler callback function, which is set with OAuthProvider::consumerHandler().
trans-unit.target: 调用已注册的使用者处理程序回调函数，该函数由OAuthProvider :: consumerHandler（）设置。

trans-unit.source: Calls the registered timestamp handler callback function, which is set with OAuthProvider::timestampNonceHandler().
trans-unit.target: 调用已注册的时间戳处理程序回调函数，该函数由OAuthProvider :: timestampNonceHandler（）设置。

trans-unit.source: Calls the registered token handler callback function, which is set with OAuthProvider::tokenHandler().
trans-unit.target: 调用已注册的令牌处理程序回调函数，该函数由OAuthProvider :: tokenHandler（）设置。

trans-unit.source: Calls to stream_socket_recvfrom() on socket-based streams, after calls to buffer-based stream functions (like fread() or stream_get_line()) read data directly from the socket and bypass the stream buffer.
trans-unit.target: 在调用基于缓冲区的流函数（如fread（）或stream_get_line（））之后，直接从套接字读取数据并绕过流缓冲区，然后在基于套接字的流上调用stream_socket_recvfrom（）。

trans-unit.source: Can also be determined later using stream_socket_get_name().
trans-unit.target: 也可以稍后使用stream_socket_get_name（）确定。

trans-unit.source: Can be 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 for built-in fonts in latin2 encoding (where higher numbers corresponding to larger fonts) or any of your own font identifiers registered with imageloadfont().
trans-unit.target: 对于采用latin2编码的内置字体（其中较大的数字表示较大的字体）或您在imageloadfont（）中注册的任何您自己的字体标识符，可以为1，2，3，4，5。

trans-unit.source: Can be STREAM_CAST_FOR_SELECT when stream_select() is calling stream_cast() or STREAM_CAST_AS_STREAM when stream_cast() is called for other uses.
trans-unit.target: 可以 STREAM_CAST_FOR_SELECT 时stream_select（）被调用stream_cast（）或 STREAM_CAST_AS_STREAM 时stream_cast（）被调用用于其他用途。

trans-unit.source: Can be a combination of the following flags (note that it doesn't make sense to use PREG_PATTERN_ORDER together with PREG_SET_ORDER):
trans-unit.target: 可以是以下标志的组合（请注意，将 PREG_PATTERN_ORDER 与 PREG_SET_ORDER 一起使用是没有意义的）：

trans-unit.source: Can be a file name or a valid stream resource.
trans-unit.target: 可以是一个文件名或一个有效的流资源。

trans-unit.source: Can be a stream opened with fopen() or similar functions, numeric file descriptor, or socket.
trans-unit.target: 可以是使用fopen（）或类似函数，数字文件描述符或套接字打开的流。

trans-unit.source: Can be called in Pool::collect() to determine if this object is garbage.
trans-unit.target: 可以在Pool :: collect（）中调用以确定该对象是否为垃圾。

trans-unit.source: Can be called multiple times to accept connections on different sockets.
trans-unit.target: 可以多次调用,接受不同套接字上的连接。

trans-unit.source: Can be called multiple times to bind the same HTTP server to multiple different ports.
trans-unit.target: 可以多次调用,将同一个HTTP服务器绑定到多个不同的端口。

trans-unit.source: Can be either "r" for read-only, "w" for write only or "rw" for read and write.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 "r "代表只读,"w "代表只写,或者 "rw "代表读写。

trans-unit.source: Can be either a host name or an IP address. Passing the NULL value or the string "localhost" to this parameter, the local host is assumed. When possible, pipes will be used instead of the TCP/IP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 可以是主机名或IP地址。将 NULL 值或字符串“ localhost”传递给此参数，将假定为本地主机。如果可能，将使用管道代替TCP / IP协议。

trans-unit.source: Can be set to DatePeriod::EXCLUDE_START_DATE to exclude the start date from the set of recurring dates within the period.
trans-unit.target: 可以将其设置为 DatePeriod::EXCLUDE_START_DATE 以将开始日期从该期间内的一系列重复日期中排除。

trans-unit.source: Can be used during SOAP header handling to report an error in the response header.
trans-unit.target: 在SOAP头处理过程中,可以用来报告响应头中的错误。

trans-unit.source: Can be used to iterate through recursive iterators.
trans-unit.target: 可用于迭代递归迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Can be used to mask the triggering of the error_handler function just like the error_reporting ini setting controls which errors are shown. Without this mask set the error_handler will be called for every error regardless to the setting of the error_reporting setting.
trans-unit.target: 可以用来掩盖 error_handler 函数的触发，就像error_reporting ini设置控制显示哪些错误一样。如果没有设置此掩码，则无论error_reporting设置如何设置，都会为每个错误调用 error_handler 。

trans-unit.source: Can be used to select the proper fault encoding from WSDL.
trans-unit.target: 可以用来从 WSDL 中选择合适的故障编码。

trans-unit.source: Can be used to set protocol specific login options, such as the preferred authentication mechanism via "AUTH=NTLM" or "AUTH=*", and should be used in conjunction with the CURLOPT_USERNAME option.
trans-unit.target: 可用于设置协议特定的登录选项，例如通过“ AUTH = NTLM”或“ AUTH = *”的首选身份验证机制，并且应与 CURLOPT_USERNAME 选项一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Can be used to split a string into smaller chunks which is useful for e.g. converting base64_encode() output to match RFC 2045 semantics. It inserts end every chunklen characters.
trans-unit.target: 可用于将字符串拆分为较小的块，这对于例如转换base64_encode（）输出以匹配RFC 2045语义很有用。它在每个 chunklen 字符 end 插入。

trans-unit.source: Can be used with other directory functions such as readdir(), rewinddir() and closedir().
trans-unit.target: 可以与其他目录函数一起使用，例如readdir（），rewinddir（）和closedir（）。

trans-unit.source: Can be useful, for instance, if you generate identifiers simultaneously on several hosts that might happen to generate the identifier at the same microsecond.
trans-unit.target: 例如,如果您在多个主机上同时生成标识符,而这些主机可能恰好在同一微秒内生成标识符,则可以很有用。

trans-unit.source: Can either be INI_SCANNER_NORMAL (default) or INI_SCANNER_RAW. If INI_SCANNER_RAW is supplied, then option values will not be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 INI_SCANNER_NORMAL （默认）或 INI_SCANNER_RAW 。如果提供了 INI_SCANNER_RAW ，则不会分析选项值。

trans-unit.source: Can read all embedded
trans-unit.target: 可以阅读所有的嵌入式

trans-unit.source: Can return all value types.
trans-unit.target: 可以返回所有值类型。

trans-unit.source: Can return any type.
trans-unit.target: 可以返回任何类型。

trans-unit.source: Can the cert be used for Any/All purposes?
trans-unit.target: 该证书可以用于任何/所有目的吗?

trans-unit.source: Can the cert be used for Netscape SSL server?
trans-unit.target: 该证书可以用于Netscape SSL服务器吗?

trans-unit.source: Can the cert be used to encrypt S/MIME email?
trans-unit.target: 该证书可以用来加密S/MIME电子邮件吗?

trans-unit.source: Can the cert be used to sign S/MIME email?
trans-unit.target: 证书可以用来签署S/MIME电子邮件吗?

trans-unit.source: Can the cert be used to sign a certificate revocation list (CRL)?
trans-unit.target: 该证书能否用于签署证书撤销列表(CRL)?

trans-unit.source: Can the certificate be used for the client side of an SSL connection?
trans-unit.target: 证书可以用于SSL连接的客户端吗?

trans-unit.source: Can the certificate be used for the server side of an SSL connection?
trans-unit.target: 证书可以用于SSL连接的服务器端吗?

trans-unit.source: Can’t be converted to an array when objects are used as keys.
trans-unit.target: 当对象用作键时，不能转换为数组。

trans-unit.source: Can't open file.
trans-unit.target: 无法打开文件。

trans-unit.source: Cancel the break operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消中断操作。

trans-unit.source: Cancels a pending HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取消一个待处理的HTTP请求。

trans-unit.source: Cancels a statement. Any results associated with the statement that have not been consumed are deleted. After sqlsrv_cancel() has been called, the specified statement can be re-executed if it was created with sqlsrv_prepare(). Calling sqlsrv_cancel() is not necessary if all the results associated with the statement have been consumed.
trans-unit.target: 取消声明。与该语句关联的所有尚未使用的结果都将被删除。调用sqlsrv_cancel（）之后，如果指定的语句是使用sqlsrv_prepare（）创建的，则可以重新执行该语句。如果与该语句关联的所有结果均已消耗，则无需调用sqlsrv_cancel（）。

trans-unit.source: Cancels an ongoing HTTP request. The callback associated with this request is not executed and the request object is freed. If the request is currently being processed, e.g. it is ongoing, the corresponding EventHttpConnection object is going to get reset.
trans-unit.target: 取消正在进行的HTTP请求。不执行与此请求关联的回调，并且释放请求对象。如果请求当前正在处理中（例如正在处理中），则相应的EventHttpConnection对象将被重置。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the event.
trans-unit.target: 取消 event 。

trans-unit.source: Cannot override special constants NULL, TRUE, FALSE, ZEND_THREAD_SAFE or ZEND_DEBUG_BUILD
trans-unit.target: 不能覆盖特殊常数NULL,TRUE,FALSE,ZEND_THREAD_SAFE或ZEND_DEBUG_BUILD。

trans-unit.source: Canonicalize nodes to a file.
trans-unit.target: 将节点规范化到文件中。

trans-unit.source: Canonicalize nodes to a string
trans-unit.target: 将节点规范化为一个字符串

trans-unit.source: Capacity does not have to be a power of 2.
trans-unit.target: 容量不一定是2的幂数。

trans-unit.source: Capacity must be a power of 2.
trans-unit.target: 容量必须是2的功率。

trans-unit.source: Capacity will always be rounded up to the nearest power of 2.
trans-unit.target: 容量总是四舍五入到最接近的2次方。

trans-unit.source: Capacity will stay the same if this value is less than or equal to the current capacity.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值小于或等于当前容量,容量将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Capture a window (IE for example)
trans-unit.target: 捕获一个窗口(例如IE)。

trans-unit.source: Capture a window (IE for example) but with its content
trans-unit.target: 捕获一个窗口(例如IE),但它的内容。

trans-unit.source: Capturing subpatterns that occur inside negative lookahead assertions are counted, but their entries in the offsets vector are never set. Perl sets its numerical variables from any such patterns that are matched before the assertion fails to match something (thereby succeeding), but only if the negative lookahead assertion contains just one branch.
trans-unit.target: 发生在负向查找断言中的捕获子模式会被计算在内,但它们在偏移向量中的条目永远不会被设置。Perl 会从断言失败(从而成功)之前匹配的任何此类模式中设置其数值变量,但只有在负向查找断言只包含一个分支的情况下才会设置。

trans-unit.source: Care must be taken when using mysqli_stmt_bind_param() in conjunction with call_user_func_array(). Note that mysqli_stmt_bind_param() requires parameters to be passed by reference, whereas call_user_func_array() can accept as a parameter a list of variables that can represent references or values.
trans-unit.target: 将mysqli_stmt_bind_param（）与call_user_func_array（）结合使用时必须小心。注意，mysqli_stmt_bind_param（）要求参数必须通过引用传递，而call_user_func_array（）可以接受可以表示引用或值的变量列表作为参数。

trans-unit.source: Care should be taken when using the highlight_file() function to make sure that you do not inadvertently reveal sensitive information such as passwords or any other type of information that might create a potential security risk.
trans-unit.target: 使用highlight_file（）函数时应小心，以确保您不会无意间泄露敏感信息，例如密码或任何其他类型的信息，这些信息可能会造成潜在的安全风险。

trans-unit.source: Case insensitive regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 对大小写不敏感的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Case sensitive regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 大小写敏感的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Case-insensitive constants are stored as lower-case.
trans-unit.target: 对大小写不敏感的常量以小写形式存储。

trans-unit.source: Caseless match. Part of the GNU extension.
trans-unit.target: 无壳匹配。GNU扩展的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Casting a variable to null using (unset) $var will not remove the variable or unset its value. It will only return a NULL value.
trans-unit.target: 使用（unset）$ var将变量强制转换为null 不会删除该变量或取消设置其值。它将仅返回 NULL 值。

trans-unit.source: Casting literal strings and variables to binary strings:
trans-unit.target: 将文字字符串 s和变量转换为二进制字符串 s：

trans-unit.source: Casting to NULL
trans-unit.target: 转换为 NULL

trans-unit.source: Casting to an array is not supported yet.
trans-unit.target: 目前尚不支持强制转换为数组。

trans-unit.source: Causes a store to add the specified flag to the flags set for the messages in the specified sequence.
trans-unit.target: 使存储将指定的 flag 添加到按指定 sequence 为消息设置的标志中。

trans-unit.source: Causes the calling context to wait for the referenced Thread to finish executing
trans-unit.target: 导致调用上下文等待被引用的线程完成执行。

trans-unit.source: Causes the worker to wait for activity from one of the Gearman job servers when operating in non-blocking I/O mode. On failure, issues a E_WARNING with the last Gearman error encountered.
trans-unit.target: 在非阻塞I / O模式下操作时，使工作人员等待Gearman作业服务器之一的活动。失败时，发出 E_WARNING 并遇到最后一个Gearman错误。

trans-unit.source: Causing this function to return a multi-dimensional array with categories in the keys of the first dimension and constants and their values in the second dimension.
trans-unit.target: 使该函数返回一个多维数组,在第一维的键中包含类别,在第二维中包含常量及其值。

trans-unit.source: Cellular
trans-unit.target: Cellular

trans-unit.source: Certain characters have special significance in HTML, and should be represented by HTML entities if they are to preserve their meanings. This function returns a string with these conversions made. If you require all input substrings that have associated named entities to be translated, use htmlentities() instead.
trans-unit.target: 某些字符在HTML中具有特殊意义，如果要保留其含义，则应由HTML实体表示。该函数返回经过这些转换的字符串。如果您需要翻译具有关联的命名实体的所有输入子字符串，请改用htmlentities（）。

trans-unit.source: Certain items that may appear in patterns are more efficient than others. It is more efficient to use a character class like [aeiou] than a set of alternatives such as (a|e|i|o|u). In general, the simplest construction that provides the required behaviour is usually the most efficient. Jeffrey Friedl's book contains a lot of discussion about optimizing regular expressions for efficient performance.
trans-unit.target: 某些可能出现在模式中的项目比其他项目更有效率。使用像[aeiou]这样的字符类,比使用一组诸如(a|e|i|o|u)这样的替代项更有效率。一般来说,能提供所需行为的最简单构造通常是最高效的。Jeffrey Friedl的书中有很多关于优化正则表达式以实现高效性能的讨论。

trans-unit.source: Certain parameter values are reported by the server automatically at connection startup or whenever their values change. pg_parameter_status() can be used to interrogate these settings. It returns the current value of a parameter if known, or FALSE if the parameter is not known.
trans-unit.target: 服务器会在连接启动时或每当其值更改时自动报告某些参数值。pg_parameter_status（）可用于询问这些设置。如果已知，它将返回参数的当前值；如果未知，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Change the brightness and/or contrast of an image. It converts the brightness and contrast parameters into slope and intercept and calls a polynomical function to apply to the image.
trans-unit.target: 改变图像的亮度和/或对比度。它将亮度和对比度参数转换为斜率和截距,并调用多项式函数应用于图像。

trans-unit.source: Change the size of an array to the new size of size. If size is less than the current array size, any values after the new size will be discarded. If size is greater than the current array size, the array will be padded with NULL values.
trans-unit.target: 将数组的大小更改为size的新 size 。如果 size 小于当前数组的大小，则新大小之后的所有值都将被丢弃。如果 size 大于当前数组的大小，则将使用 NULL 值填充该数组。

trans-unit.source: Change this target color to specified opacity value within the image.
trans-unit.target: 在图像内将此目标颜色改为指定的不透明度值。

trans-unit.source: Change this target color to the fill color within the image. An ImagickPixel object or a string representing the target color.
trans-unit.target: 将此目标色改为图像中的填充色。一个ImagickPixel对象或代表目标颜色的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Changed initial to allow mixed, previously integer.
trans-unit.target: 更改 initial 以允许混合，以前是整数。

trans-unit.source: Changed the context parameter to actually have an effect. Previously, any context was ignored.
trans-unit.target: 更改了 context 参数以实际生效。以前，任何 context 被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Changed the default value of sort_flags back to SORT_STRING.
trans-unit.target: 将 sort_flags 的默认值更改回 SORT_STRING 。

trans-unit.source: Changed the function to use the streams API. It means that you can use it with wrappers, like md5_file('http://example.com/..')
trans-unit.target: 更改了使用流API的功能。这意味着您可以将其与包装一起使用，例如md5_file（'http://example.com/ ..'）

trans-unit.source: Changed the function to use the streams API. It means that you can use it with wrappers, like sha1_file('http://example.com/..')
trans-unit.target: 更改了使用流API的功能。这意味着您可以将其与包装一起使用，例如sha1_file（'http://example.com/ ..'）

trans-unit.source: Changed the return value on success from NULL to DateTime.
trans-unit.target: 将成功时的返回值从 NULL 更改为DateTime。

trans-unit.source: Changed: An E_WARNING level error is issued if the magic overloading methods are declared static. It also enforces the public visibility requirement.
trans-unit.target: 更改：如果将魔术重载方法声明为static，则发出 E_WARNING 级错误。它还强制执行公众可见性要求。

trans-unit.source: Changed: Classes that implement interfaces with methods that have default values in the prototype are no longer required to match the interface's default value.
trans-unit.target: 改变了。实现接口的类,其方法在原型中具有默认值,不再需要与接口的默认值匹配。

trans-unit.source: Changed: If an abstract class defines a signature for the constructor it will now be enforced.
trans-unit.target: 更改：如果抽象类为构造函数定义了签名，则现在将强制它。

trans-unit.source: Changed: In previous versions of PHP 5, the use of var was considered deprecated and would issue an E_STRICT level error. It's no longer deprecated, therefore does not emit the error.
trans-unit.target: 更改：在PHP 5的早期版本中，不建议使用var，它将发出 E_STRICT 级错误。它不再被弃用，因此不会发出错误。

trans-unit.source: Changed: It's now possible to reference the class using a variable (e.g., echo $classname::constant;). The variable's value can not be a keyword (e.g., self, parent or static).
trans-unit.target: 更改：现在可以使用变量来引用类（例如，echo $ classname :: constant;）。变量的值不能是关键字（例如self，parent或static）。

trans-unit.source: Changed: Methods with the same name as the last element of a namespaced class name will no longer be treated as constructor. This change doesn't affect non-namespaced classes.
trans-unit.target: 更改：与命名空间类名称的最后一个元素具有相同名称的方法将不再被视为Constructor。此更改不会影响非命名空间的类。

trans-unit.source: Changed: Prior to 5.3.0, exceptions thrown in the __autoload() function could not be caught in the catch block, and would result in a fatal error. Exceptions now thrown in the __autoload function can be caught in the catch block, with one provison. If throwing a custom exception, then the custom exception class must be available. The __autoload function may be used recursively to autoload the custom exception class.
trans-unit.target: 更改：在5.3.0之前，__ autoload（）函数中引发的异常无法在catch块中捕获，并会导致致命错误。__autoload函数中现在引发的异常可以通过一个限制在catch块中捕获。如果引发自定义异常，则自定义异常类必须可用。可以递归使用__autoload函数自动加载自定义异常类。

trans-unit.source: Changed: The __set_state() static method is now called for classes exported by var_export().
trans-unit.target: 更改：现在，对于由var_export（）导出的类调用__set_state（）静态方法。

trans-unit.source: Changed: The __toString() method was only called when it was directly combined with echo or print. But now, it is called in any string context (e.g. in printf() with %s modifier) but not in other types contexts (e.g. with %d modifier). Since PHP 5.2.0, converting objects without a __toString method to string emits a E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR level error.
trans-unit.target: 更改：__toString（）方法仅在与echo或print直接组合时才被调用。但是现在，它可以在任何字符串上下文中（例如，在具有％s修饰符的printf（）中）被调用，而在其他类型的上下文中（例如，具有％d修饰符）则不会被调用。从PHP 5.2.0开始，将没有__toString方法的对象转换为字符串会产生 E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR 级别的错误。

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: Changelog

trans-unit.source: Changelog →
trans-unit.target: 更新日志→

trans-unit.source: Changes PHP's current directory to directory.
trans-unit.target: 将PHP的当前目录更改为 directory 。

trans-unit.source: Changes any pixel that matches color with the color defined by fill.
trans-unit.target: 将任何与颜色相匹配的像素改变为由填充定义的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Changes any pixel that matches color with the color defined by fill. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.3.8 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 将任何与颜色相匹配的像素改变为由 fill 定义的颜色。如果Imagick是根据ImageMagick 6.3.8或更新的版本编译的,则此方法可用。

trans-unit.source: Changes file, or directory permissions.
trans-unit.target: 改变文件,或目录的权限。

trans-unit.source: Changes the color value of any pixel that matches target and is an immediate neighbor.
trans-unit.target: 改变任何与目标相匹配并且是近邻的像素的颜色值。

trans-unit.source: Changes the color value of any pixel that matches target and is an immediate neighbor. As of ImageMagick 6.3.8 this method has been deprecated and Imagick::floodfillPaintImage() should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 更改与目标匹配并且是直接相邻像素的任何像素的颜色值。从ImageMagick 6.3.8开始，此方法已弃用，而应改用Imagick :: floodfillPaintImage（）。

trans-unit.source: Changes the color value of any pixel that matches target and is an immediate neighbor. This method is a replacement for deprecated Imagick::paintFloodFillImage(). This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.3.8 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 更改与目标匹配并且是直接相邻像素的任何像素的颜色值。此方法替代不推荐使用的Imagick :: paintFloodFillImage（）。如果Imagick已针对ImageMagick 6.3.8版或更高版本进行编译，则此方法可用。

trans-unit.source: Changes the current directory to the specified one.
trans-unit.target: 将当前目录改为指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: Changes the default external entity loader.
trans-unit.target: 更改默认的外部实体加载器。

trans-unit.source: Changes the driver error handling and logging configurations.
trans-unit.target: 更改驱动程序的错误处理和日志配置。

trans-unit.source: Changes the file descriptor on which the buffered event operates.
trans-unit.target: 改变缓冲事件操作的文件描述符。

trans-unit.source: Changes the root directory of the current process to directory, and changes the current working directory to "/".
trans-unit.target: 将当前进程的根目录更改为 directory ，并将当前工作目录更改为“ /”。

trans-unit.source: Changes the size of an image to the given dimensions and removes any associated profiles. The goal is to produce small low cost thumbnail images suited for display on the Web. If TRUE is given as a third parameter then columns and rows parameters are used as maximums for each side. Both sides will be scaled down until the match or are smaller than the parameter given for the side.
trans-unit.target: 将图像的大小改为给定的尺寸,并删除任何相关的配置文件。目标是生成适合在网络上显示的小型低成本缩略图。如果给定TRUE作为第三个参数,那么列和行参数将作为每边的最大值。两边将被缩小,直到匹配或小于为边所给的参数。

trans-unit.source: Changes the size of an image to the given dimensions and removes any associated profiles. The goal is to produce small, low cost thumbnail images suited for display on the Web. If TRUE is given as a third parameter then columns and rows parameters are used as maximums for each side. Both sides will be scaled down until they match or are smaller than the parameter given for the side.
trans-unit.target: 将图像的大小更改为给定的尺寸，并删除所有关联的配置文件。目标是生成适合在Web上显示的小型，低成本缩略图图像。如果将 TRUE 作为第三个参数，则将column和rows参数用作每一侧的最大值。两侧将按比例缩小，直到它们匹配或小于为该侧给出的参数。

trans-unit.source: Checks information about the current mailbox.
trans-unit.target: 检查当前邮箱的信息。

trans-unit.source: Checks the current mailbox status on the server. It is similar to imap_status(), but will additionally sum up the size of all messages in the mailbox, which will take some additional time to execute.
trans-unit.target: 检查服务器上的当前邮箱状态。它类似于imap_status（），但将另外汇总邮箱中所有消息的大小，这将花费一些额外的时间来执行。

trans-unit.source: Checks the distance between the color described by this ImagickPixel object and that of the provided object, by plotting their RGB values on the color cube. If the distance between the two points is less than the fuzz value given, the colors are similar. Deprecated in favour of ImagickPixel::isPixelSimilar().
trans-unit.target: 通过在颜色立方体上绘制其RGB值，检查此ImagickPixel对象描述的颜色与所提供对象的颜色之间的距离。如果两点之间的距离小于给定的模糊值，则颜色相似。不推荐使用ImagickPixel :: isPixelSimilar（）。

trans-unit.source: Checks the distance between the color described by this ImagickPixel object and that of the provided object, by plotting their RGB values on the color cube. If the distance between the two points is less than the fuzz value given, the colors are similar. This method replaces ImagickPixel::isSimilar() and correctly normalises the fuzz value to ImageMagick QuantumRange.
trans-unit.target: 通过在颜色立方体上绘制其RGB值，检查此ImagickPixel对象描述的颜色与所提供对象的颜色之间的距离。如果两点之间的距离小于给定的模糊值，则颜色相似。此方法替换ImagickPixel :: isSimilar（）并将绒毛值正确归一化为ImageMagick QuantumRange。

trans-unit.source: Checks the list of defined functions, both built-in (internal) and user-defined, for function_name.
trans-unit.target: 检查function_name的内置（内部）和用户定义的已定义 function_name 。

trans-unit.source: Checks the sign of a number.
trans-unit.target: 检查数字的符号。

trans-unit.source: Checks the threads status
trans-unit.target: 检查线程状态

trans-unit.source: Checks the validity of sub iterators.
trans-unit.target: 检查子迭代器的有效性。

trans-unit.source: Checks the validity of the date formed by the arguments. A date is considered valid if each parameter is properly defined.
trans-unit.target: 检查参数形成的日期的有效性。如果每个参数都被正确定义,则日期被认为是有效的。

trans-unit.source: Checks validity of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 检查当前元素的有效性。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether val is 'not a number', like the result of acos(1.01).
trans-unit.target: 检查 val 是否为'not a number'，如acos（1.01）的结果。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether val is a legal finite on this platform.
trans-unit.target: 检查 val 在此平台上是否合法。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether a file or directory exists.
trans-unit.target: 检查文件或目录是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether a function is defined in a namespace.
trans-unit.target: 检查函数是否在命名空间中定义。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether a specific key exists inside a shared memory segment.
trans-unit.target: 检查共享内存段内是否存在特定的密钥。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether a specific method is defined in a class.
trans-unit.target: 检查类中是否定义了特定的方法。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether a string is tainted
trans-unit.target: 检查一个字符串是否被污染

trans-unit.source: Checks whether an object exists in the storage.
trans-unit.target: 检查存储中是否存在对象。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether it implements an interface.
trans-unit.target: 检查它是否实现了一个接口。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the child process exited because of a signal which was not caught.
trans-unit.target: 检查子进程是否因信号未被捕获而退出。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the child process which caused the return is currently stopped; this is only possible if the call to pcntl_waitpid() was done using the option WUNTRACED.
trans-unit.target: 检查导致返回的子进程当前是否已停止；仅当使用选项WUNTRACED完成对pcntl_waitpid（）的调用时，才有可能。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the child status code represents a normal exit.
trans-unit.target: 检查子状态码是否代表正常退出。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the class has a specific constant defined or not.
trans-unit.target: 检查该类是否定义了一个特定的常量。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the class is an interface.
trans-unit.target: 检查该类是否为接口。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the class is iterateable.
trans-unit.target: 检查该类是否可迭代。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the class is user-defined, as opposed to internal.
trans-unit.target: 检查该类是否是用户定义的,而不是内部定义的。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the client disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 检查客户端是否断线。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the connection to the server is working. If it has gone down and global option mysqli.reconnect is enabled, an automatic reconnection is attempted.
trans-unit.target: 检查与服务器的连接是否正常。如果已关闭并且启用了全局选项mysqli.reconnect，则尝试自动重新连接。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the current element is valid.

trans-unit.target: 检查该文档是否有任何子文档

trans-unit.target: 检查该函数是否为内部函数,而不是用户定义的。

trans-unit.target: 检查该函数是否是用户定义的,而不是内部定义的。

trans-unit.target: 检查给定 key 是否是与 cert 相对应的私钥。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the given constant exists and is defined.
trans-unit.target: 检查给定常量是否存在,是否已经定义。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the passed object is referenced in the map.

trans-unit.target: 检查该财产是否为私人财产。

trans-unit.target: 检查财产是否受到保护。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the property is public.
trans-unit.target: 检查该财产是否为公共财产。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the property is static.
trans-unit.target: 检查该属性是否为静态。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the property was declared at compile-time, or whether the property was dynamically declared at run-time.
trans-unit.target: 检查该属性是在编译时声明的,还是在运行时动态声明的。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the reflected function has a return type specified.
trans-unit.target: 确认反射函数是否有指定的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the reflected function is a Closure.
trans-unit.target: 检查反射函数是否为Closure。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the requested index index exists.
trans-unit.target: 检查请求的索引 index 是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the specified property is defined.
trans-unit.target: 检查是否定义了指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether two given strings can easily be mistaken.
trans-unit.target: 检查两个给定的字符串是否容易弄错。

trans-unit.source: Children of this class are passed to stream_filter_register().
trans-unit.target: 此类的子级传递给stream_filter_register（）。

trans-unit.source: Choose a random pixel in a neighborhood of this extent.
trans-unit.target: 在这个范围的附近随机选择一个像素。

trans-unit.source: Chunk of data to parse. A document may be parsed piece-wise by calling xml_parse() several times with new data, as long as the is_final parameter is set and TRUE when the last data is parsed.
trans-unit.target: 要解析的数据块。只要设置了 is_final 参数并且对最后一个数据进行解析时为 TRUE ，就可以通过用新数据多次调用xml_parse（）来分段解析文档。

trans-unit.source: Chunk size as set by ob_start()
trans-unit.target: 由ob_start（）设置的块大小

trans-unit.source: Chunk size.
trans-unit.target: 块大小。

trans-unit.source: Chunks an array into arrays with size elements. The last chunk may contain less than size elements.
trans-unit.target: 将数组分为具有 size 元素的数组。最后一块可能包含少于 size 的元素。

trans-unit.source: Circumflex (^) need not be the first character of the pattern if a number of alternatives are involved, but it should be the first thing in each alternative in which it appears if the pattern is ever to match that branch. If all possible alternatives start with a circumflex (^), that is, if the pattern is constrained to match only at the start of the subject, it is said to be an "anchored" pattern. (There are also other constructs that can cause a pattern to be anchored.)
trans-unit.target: 如果涉及多种选择，则抑扬符（^）不必是模式的第一个字符，但是如果模式曾经与该分支匹配，则它应该是每种选择中的第一件事。如果所有可能的选择都以抑扬符（^）开头，也就是说，如果该模式被约束为仅在对象开始时才匹配，则称其为“锚定”模式。（还有其他可能导致模式锚定的构造。）

trans-unit.source: Civil twilight: conventionally used to signify the end of dusk.
trans-unit.target: 民间黄昏:习惯上用来表示黄昏的结束。

trans-unit.source: Civil twilight: conventionally used to signify the start of dawn.
trans-unit.target: 民间黄昏:习惯上用来表示黎明的开始。

trans-unit.source: Class constructor initializes the object and sets the q parameter if passed
trans-unit.target: 类构造函数初始化对象,并在传递q参数的情况下设置参数。

trans-unit.source: Class member variables are called "properties". You may also see them referred to using other terms such as "attributes" or "fields", but for the purposes of this reference we will use "properties". They are defined by using one of the keywords public, protected, or private, followed by a normal variable declaration. This declaration may include an initialization, but this initialization must be a constant value--that is, it must be able to be evaluated at compile time and must not depend on run-time information in order to be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 类成员变量称为“属性”。您可能还会看到使用其他术语（例如“属性”或“字段”）来引用它们，但是出于参考目的，我们将使用“属性”。它们是使用关键字public，protected或private之一定义的，后跟普通变量声明。该声明可以包含一个初始化，但是此初始化必须是一个常量值-也就是说，它必须能够在编译时进行评估，并且必须不依赖于运行时信息才能进行评估。

trans-unit.source: Class methods may be defined as public, private, or protected. Methods declared without any explicit visibility keyword are defined as public.
trans-unit.target: 类方法可以被定义为public、private或protected。没有任何显式可见性关键字的方法被定义为public。

trans-unit.source: Class name
trans-unit.target: 班级名称

trans-unit.source: Class name and method name delimited by ::.
trans-unit.target: 类名和方法名以::分隔。

trans-unit.source: Class name.
trans-unit.target: 班级名称:

trans-unit.source: Class names that do not contain a backslash like name can be resolved in 2 different ways.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用2种不同的方式来解析不包含反斜杠（例如name）的类名。

trans-unit.source: Class properties and methods live in separate "namespaces", so it is possible to have a property and a method with the same name. Referring to both a property and a method has the same notation, and whether a property will be accessed or a method will be called, solely depends on the context, i.e. whether the usage is a variable access or a function call.
trans-unit.target: 类的属性和方法分别生活在不同的 "命名空间 "中,所以有可能出现一个属性和一个方法同名的情况。引用一个属性和一个方法都有相同的记号,是访问一个属性还是调用一个方法,完全取决于上下文,即用法是变量访问还是函数调用。

trans-unit.source: Class properties may also be accessed using variable property names. The variable property name will be resolved within the scope from which the call is made. For instance, if you have an expression such as <var><var>$foo->$bar</var></var>, then the local scope will be examined for <var><var>$bar</var></var> and its value will be used as the name of the property of <var><var>$foo</var></var>. This is also true if <var><var>$bar</var></var> is an array access.
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用变量属性名称来访问类属性。变量属性名称将在进行调用的范围内解析。例如，如果您有一个表达式，例如 <var><var>$foo->$bar</var></var> ，那么将检查本地范围中的 <var><var>$bar</var></var> 并将其值用作 <var><var>$foo</var></var> 属性的名称。如果 <var><var>$bar</var></var> 是数组访问，也是如此。

trans-unit.source: Class properties must be defined as public, private, or protected. If declared using var, the property will be defined as public.
trans-unit.target: 类属性必须定义为公共，私有或受保护的。如果使用var声明，则该属性将定义为public。

trans-unit.source: Class property data types are ignored when applying a field value to a property.
trans-unit.target: 将字段值应用到属性时,类属性数据类型被忽略。
